programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: A pair of celebrities prepare to tackle some of the worlds most dangerous roads in this documentary series fraught with danger, delight and, with several comedians taking on the challenge, plenty of humour. Each episode sees a different pair of famous faces team up and traverse a hazardous route across difficult terrain. These potentially deadly routes dissect dramatic mountain ranges, sweltering jungles, desolate deserts and icy highways, encompassing some our planets most spectacular landscapes. Duos have included Hugh Bonneville and Jessica Hynes, as they navigate their way through Georgia, Marcus Brigstoke and Phil Jupitus, broadening their horizons of Bolivia, and Rhod Gilbert and Greg Davies, who weave through the stunning Himalayas.

programme.title: Eatute saladused
programme.desc: Uus BBC dokumentaalsari võtab vaatluse alla inimesed, kel on pealtnaha õnnestunud valtida vananemise negatiivseid mõjusid ning sailitada kõrgest east hoolimata vitaalsus ja hea tervis. Kas põhjuseks on geneetika, toitumine või keskkond? Või kõigi koosmõju? Meditsiiniajakirjanik dr Michael Mosley kusib esimeses osas nooruslike eakate kaest, kuidas oma mõistust ja malu võimalikult kaua vahedana hoida.

programme.title: Maailma kauneimad rongiteed
programme.desc: From the land of the midnight sun in Norway to the majestic mountains of New Zealand, we will be taking six very individual and stunningly beautiful train journeys, narrated by Bill Nighy. On each one well meet the people who work and live along these special rail lines in six different countries - Norway, Canada, Switzerland, Wales, Spain and New Zealand. Well explore the natural wonders along the route, meet the engineers who keep the trains running, and historians who reveal the challenges the builders faced when constructing these magnificent feats of engineering. These are no ordinary trips, these are some of the most scenic rail journeys in the World!

programme.title: Planet Earth III
programme.desc: Much of our world remains virtually unexplored because most of it is under water. The ocean covers two-thirds of the planet and is home to 80 per cent of all animal life. Yet we know little about it. Presented by Sir David Attenborough, this groundbreaking film journeys through the vast and varied ocean to reveal the extraordinary behaviours and adaptations required for life there. The shallow seas of the tropics may look like a paradise, but they are a battlefield, where even predators like the deadly lionfish must beware. Nothing is what it seems. The clown frogfish, the reefs most extraordinary hunter, carries a fishing rod on its head, baited with a shrimp-like lure that can prove fatally seductive. Away from the tropics, in the cold waters off North America, the sun fuels forests of giant kelp. It is a dangerous place for young horn sharks. Giant sea bass and larger sharks patrol through the kelp. But the real danger is buried beneath. A little horn shark unwittingly stumbles into the ambush of an angel shark. With a lightning strike, it is swallowed whole. But it is not over yet - the little horn shark has a secret weapon. Winter storms can batter the forest and rip the kelp from the seabed, casting it away into the open ocean. Out in the big blue, the floating kelp becomes a vital lifeline for animals such as flying fish, which use them to lay their eggs. But they must lay thousands because these eggs are on the menu for hungry blue sharks. Life in the vastness of the open ocean relies on these islands of seaweed, but today they are being replaced by something altogether different - plastic. Every year, 12 million tonnes end up in the ocean. It is lethal to many, but some animals are learning to take advantage of these plastic rafts. Meet the Columbus crab. An open ocean creature with a big problem. Columbus crabs are poor swimmers, so to find a mate, they must hitch a lift. Passing turtles can help, and in fact provide a permanent home for a pair of crabs. In return, the crabs provide an onboard grooming service, a relationship that works so well that these turtles are often home to a devoted Columbus crab couple. Finding a partner in the ocean is not always easy. In the Sea of Cortez, mobula rays perform astounding acrobatic leaps to attract other rays, resulting in a gathering of vast numbers. All the noise, however, attracts a family of specialist ray-hunting orca that have a unique strategy to catch these fast and agile animals. The least-known parts of the ocean are its great depths. To venture there requires specialised vessels to withstand the crushing pressure. As you leave the surface behind, sunlight fades and you enter an alien world, encountering a massive siphonophore, longer than a blue whale, and a gulper eel with huge jaws that can engulf prey larger than its own body. By the time you reach the seabed two miles down, the temperature has dropped to near freezing, so cold that the eggs of a mother pearl octopus would take over ten years to develop. She heads to a special place where warm water escaping from the seabed creates a thermal spa. She is joined by 20,000 female octopuses, all here to raise their eggs - the largest-known gathering of octopus on planet earth. The warm water speeds up her eggs development, but it will still take two years and in that time this devoted mother will not leave them, not even to feed. It is an extreme effort that will eventually kill her. In todays ocean, animals are having to compete with us. Off the coast of Chile, South American sea lions have learned clever techniques to raid fishermens nets - which they now do in their thousands, but it comes with a huge risk. As the net is drawn in, the sea lions must get out quickly, or they risk being crushed and drowned. Sadly, the inexperienced young and pups dont get out in time, and some pay the ultimate price. Animals have evolved in remarkable ways to cope with the demands of life in the ocean. But can they now adapt to the new challenge... living alongside us?

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli. Kanada
programme.desc: Pakane paugub ning Beck ja Dene suunduvad kulmunud jarvele, et oma naljastele kelgukoertele varsket kala puuda. Ühes kuus pistavad koerad nahka 300 suurt kala ning puuda tuleb palju. Kulma on 40 kraadi ning võrgud tuleb panna rohkem kui meetrise jaa alla. Põhja-Ontarios tuleb Bentleyl paksus lumes labida lõputuid kilomeetreid ning uletada ohtlikke takistusi. Lisaks otsustab ta võtta ette 40 km pikkuse teekonna, et vedada 200-kilone kalapaat labi paksu metsa. Kim ja Pierre ei raiska samuti aega. Nad teevad tutvust ohtliku ahmiga, keda huutakse ka põhjamaa kuradiks.

programme.title: Kus on metsikud mehed?
programme.desc: Ben Fogle explores and follows the same path that various individuals have walked. Having willingly forsaken the luxuries and lifestyle that the modern world has to offer, Ben Fogle explores the less-than-ordinary life that people have swapped to in the wilderness. Many of these destinations are primarily "off the grid" in some of the most remote locations on earth, including Georgia Swamplands USA, Swedish Arctic Circle, Wilderness Island Australia and the Sahara Desert. Men, either alone or with a family, sacrifice the comforts and almost any social life to experience the hardships, challenges and rewards of a life that is constantly challenged by nature and be at one with nature. Being largely dependant on their own abilities, Ben Fogle experiences their way of living for a week to understand the reasons behind why they chose this new way of living. Released on Channel 5 in the UK, Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild was produced by Motion Content Group and Renegade Pictures.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: HARDtalk
programme.desc: Stephen Sackur is the main host of the legendary HARDtalk interview programme on a one-on-one basis. He has interviewed prominent international personalities including presidents and prime ministers of several countries, leading cultural figures, scientists, actors, influencers. The other presenters are Zeinab Badawi and Sarah Montague. HARDtalk is the proper name for the show, the issues being discussed are very essential and sensitive, and often the questions are not the easiest to answer. The hosts are genuine experts who always get to the core of every topic, get all the answers from the guests so that the viewers see the whole picture.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Business Today
programme.desc: The latest business news from Singapore and around the world.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: BBC Focus on Africa
programme.desc: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. The program used to be presented by Komla Dumor each weekday from its inception until his death in 2014; now it is hosted by Sophie Ikenye, a news presenter from Kenya. The program includes news, sport and business from across Africa and the rest of the globe. Get the top African stories and keep up with the latest international events.

HARDtalk is the proper name for the show, the issues being discussed are very essential and sensitive, and often the questions are not the easiest to answer. The hosts are genuine experts who always get to the core of every topic, get all the answers from the guests so that the viewers see the whole picture.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: The Travel Show
programme.desc: Join the Travel Show team as they take you on a criss-cross journey across the globe, visiting the most popular holiday destinations as well as sampling some hidden gems. The itinerary includes up-and-coming hot spots for holidaymakers and uncovering some lesser-known facts about places on many peoples bucket lists. programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: Talking Business
programme.desc: On Talking Business BBC presenters, based in the worlds most dynamic cities, discuss with the most important and influential people from the world of business and finance, the key issues of the day. Corporate leaders, global investors, top creatives, cutting-edge entrepreneurs and leading intellectuals gather together weekly to discuss and analyse the issues and trends that most affect how business has to work in todays world. Our team of presenters are experts on the issues and developments which are shaping the way we work, consume and live in the 21st Century.

programme.title: The Media Show
programme.desc: A global, topical weekly show that lifts the hood on the entertainment and news business.

programme.title: Bloomberg Balance of Power
programme.desc: Informational programme covering stories about worldwide politics, business and everything in between. The journalists report on the top news stories from these two fields, and interview experts who share their thoughts on a wide range of relevant topics.

programme.title: Bloomberg the Asia Trade
programme.desc: Live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders on the biggest stories shaping markets.

programme.title: Bloomberg
programme.desc: Yvonne Man and David Ingles give global investors unique insight into Chinas economy, with in-depth analysis and conversations with newsmakers.

programme.title: Insight with Haslinda Amin
programme.desc: The definitive guide for global news audiences to get the complete picture on the biggest story of the day, through probing interviews and nuanced conversations.

programme.title: Bloomberg Horizons Middle East and Africa
programme.desc: Linking the market drivers from overnight in the US and across Asia into the regions trading day, with deep dive analysis of the top business, energy and geopolitical stories shaping decisions.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak
programme.desc: Dont miss the latest and most important business news and stories from European markets, Wall Street, because overnight there is morning in Europe and around the world. The programme is hosted by Nejra Cehic, live from London with the help from Manus Cranny and some other hosts.

programme.title: Bloomberg
programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down the biggest stories of the day and speak to guests with skin in the game. Hosted by Anna Edwards, Guy Johnson and Kriti Gupta.

programme.title: The Pulse with Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: Conversations with high profile guests in the beating heart of global business, finance and politics. We go wherever the story is, bringing you exclusive interviews and market-moving scoops.

programme.title: Bloomberg Brief
programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Take a look at the latest news in finance, economics and investment, most important business stories and the state of the markets as each day begins. Join hosts Tom Keene and Francine Lacqua, who broadcast live from New York to London each morning and discuss markets with various leaders in global finance and economics. Find out everything you need to know about stocks, bonds, currencies and commodities in Bloomberg Surveillance.

programme.title: Bloomberg Open Interest
programme.desc: Matt Miller, Katie Greifeld and Sonali Basak deliver the market-moving news you need to know to get a jump start on the US trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: Hosted by Ed Ludlow from San Francisco, California, and Caroline Hyde in New York, this captivating show focuses on global technology, innovation, and the future of business. It features original reporting and interesting interviews with various tech newsmakers- venture capitalists, CEOs, start-up entrepreneurs, and analysts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg TVs flagship markets programme, providing key insights, analysis and context at the market close. Its a highly intelligent look at the markets that misses nothing.

programme.title: The David Rubenstein Show
programme.sub-title: The David Rubenstein Show: Peer to Peer Conversations
programme.desc: Join financier and philanthropist David Rubenstein as he travels around the US to interview some notable people, his peers, in order to find out what makes them such good leaders and so successful. He will talk to some of the most influential people in business and politics - Bill Gates, Warren Buffett, Indra Nooyi, Condoleezza Rice, Phil Knight, Bill Clinton, George W Bush,... hearing their life stories and how they became people they are today.

programme.desc: Alix Steel, Romaine Bostick and Scarlet Fu own the market-moving breaking news around the closing bell in this must-watch daily program to get an edge on equities, earnings and the economy.

programme.title: Bloomberg Balance of Power
programme.desc: Informational programme covering stories about worldwide politics, business and everything in between. The journalists report on the top news stories from these two fields, and interview experts who share their thoughts on a wide range of relevant topics.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week
programme.desc: Join David Westin as he dissects the latest stories and movements from Wall Street, inviting informed guests and financial experts to provide their thoughts and analysis regarding the market. He examines the impact that the current environment is having on businesses and traders, whilst looking ahead to peruse the likely changes across the financial industry. Whether its CEOs, professors or politicians, each offer their forthright opinions on the financial positives and negatives across the USA, evaluating the significance of the present climate and how they believe the country can continue to improve.

programme.title: Next Africa
programme.desc: A monthly deep dive into Africas biggest stories through a Bloomberg lens, discussing key steps taken to help deliver on Africas quest of bridging the gap with global powers.

programme.title: Posthuman
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets some of the worlds most advanced, intelligent, robots. Will the creation of a synthetic species with human-like intelligence improve the human experience, or end it?

programme.title: Posthuman
programme.sub-title: Love in the Age of Machines
programme.desc: Can we have real intimacy with machines? Emily Chang explores the future of such connections and the technologies powering a growing market of relationships-on-demand.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets NBA player and Thirty Ink CEO Stephen Curry to discuss his growing business portfolio, partnership with Under Armour and retail ambitions to rival Nikes Jordan Brand.

programme.title: The David Rubenstein Show
programme.sub-title: The David Rubenstein Show: Peer to Peer Conversations
programme.desc: Join financier and philanthropist David Rubenstein as he travels around the US to interview some notable people, his peers, in order to find out what makes them such good leaders and so successful. He will talk to some of the most influential people in business and politics - Bill Gates, Warren Buffett, Indra Nooyi, Condoleezza Rice, Phil Knight, Bill Clinton, George W Bush,... hearing their life stories and how they became people they are today.

programme.title: Bloomberg Originals

He rewinds into the past and remembers Gumball had left him in The Void. / When we last saw Gumball he was hitting rewind on Robs Universal Remote just in time to save himself from being trapped in The Void. / Gumball and Darwin go to extreme lengths to help Molly make her dull stories more interesting. / Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is embarrassed when Mum comes to school to spend some "quality time".

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Darwin and Gumball reveal how theyd spend their perfect day, Gumball confesses that he would spend it with Penny. Darwin gets jealous and sets out to dig some dirt on Penny, hoping it will split them up. Meanwhile Gumball is planning to step his and Pennys relationship up a notch, by proposing marriage!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Granny Jojo has brought a boyfriend to her birthday meal and Dad isnt happy about it. He bans Granny JoJo from ever seeing Louis again. When the kids get caught sneaking Granny Jojo out of the house, Dad challenges Louis to a man-off to prove once and for all who is the man of the house?!!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry. When they call to complain about their late pizza its the final straw for Larry and he quits all of his jobs. Elmores fragile commercial structure collapses and the citizens revert to a more primitive apocalyptic state.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. The whole town embrace this festival and get excited about the arrival of the Sluzzle Dude; leaving it to Gumball and Anais to keep everyones Sluzzle Tag dreams alive.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. Miss Simian warns them about the Butterfly Effect whereby the flap of an insects wings can start a tornado on the other side of the world. Paying no heed, Gumball releases the emergent butterfly into the wild, where it causes havoc upon Elmore.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Things keep going missing in the house, so its up to Gumball and Darwin to find the culprit. They discover that a mysterious person has been secretly living in their home. Gumball and Darwin manage to turn this confused squatter into their mortal enemy.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. When they find one that depicts Gumball running naked through the mall, Gumball is determined not to let it come to pass. However events conspire against him, and Gumball learns that sometimes you cant fight fate.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. He tries to protect them from the world around them and soon Darwins over-protective control-freakery spreads to every corner of Elmore. The Wattersons have no choice but to overthrow his despotic regime.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. Gumball and Darwin help Anais make up an imaginary friend who, much to all their surprise, appears in front of them. Gumball and Darwin teach Anais and her new friend how to become friends, but soon realise that he might not be so imaginary after all...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons receive an unmarked package in the mail. To distract themselves from the urge to open it, they all take turns to imagine what it might contain. To Mom it could mean financial freedom, to Gumball it could mean superpowers: to whoever its actually for, it means theyre not getting their package.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Miss Simian discovers a failed test from Gumballs past that brings down his grade point average. This means he has to retake kindergarten all over again, much to her delight. But by demoting him Miss Simian has inadvertently brought herself down, and theyre left with no choice but to team up if they want things back to normal.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin discover the reason Dads diet wasnt working was that he was actually on ten diets: and eating a meal for each of them. They eventually manage to help him lose weight, but Richards newfound buffness also brings out his more obnoxious side.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball discovers that Rob, his old nemesis, is "neme-seeing" someone else now. Devastated that Rob has fallen out of hate with him, Gumball refuses to accept that his ex-nemesis has moved on and does his best to sabotage Robs blossoming relationship with his new foe, Banana Joe.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When they see the school bullies making fun of Sussie Gumball and Darwin decide to try and help her act less weird. They carefully observe her behavior and decide that the only thing they have to change is absolutely everything.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Richards got a motorcycle helmet stuck on his head, so when he goes into a bank the terrified staff all assume hes there to rob the place and hand over a load of cash. Richard leaves with the money, completely oblivious to the fact hes just performed a stick-up. Nicole and the kids soon tell him what hes done and try to figure out a way to avoid the police manhunt and return the cash.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Leslies petals begin falling off he feels like his good looks are fading, Gumball and Darwin use everything they know about style and beauty to try and help him. The only problem is they know nothing about style or beauty. As Gumball and Darwins methods become more extreme, Leslie questions whether hes prepared to make the ultimate sacrifice for beauty.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When a typically stressful Watterson family dinner pushes her to the edge of her sanity, Nicole starts reminiscing about the time she met Richard. Might her life have been better if shed never stopped to talk to her future husband and taken a different path instead?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When the Wattersons internet cuts out, they have to adapt to a world without it. / Gumball decides to make some changes when an online personality test tells him that hes "The Loser". / Rocky is trying to find love with the help of the latest dating app… / Gumball and Darwin give Bobert specific instructions to ensure he acts safely. When Bobert starts applying his robot logic to their rules they realise they must be much clearer.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is livid when an online test keeps telling him that his character-type is "The Loser". Hes convinced that the only way to shake off this label is to do the opposite of everything he normally would. But Gumball suppressing his natural instincts leaves a vacuum, a Gumball-shaped hole that someone has to fill. That someone is Tobias, who starts turning the whole show into a cliched sitcom.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin give Bobert specific instructions to ensure he acts in a safe and responsible manner. When Bobert starts applying his robot logic to their rules, they soon realise theyre going to have to be much clearer. Or he will end up destroying them all...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Nicole tries (and fails) to hide her disappointment when Richard and the kids fail to remember her special day. Richard has to figure out what special day he has actually forgotten, and then make it a day to remember… or else!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: From a high-speed police chase to the inside scoop on Daisy the Donkey, Channel 6 Elmore News has all the top hard-hitting local stories. Experienced newscaster Kip Schlezinger is the man to bring you the latest news, sports and weather, even when there is absolutely nothing to report...

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: When Lamput disguises himself as a book and gets returned to the Library, the Docs have to be super quiet in their attempts to get him back. They finally manage to sneak past the Librarian, but all chaos erupts when they open a mysterious book in the restricted area. Lamput and the Docs have to team up to get the new ghostly resident back to where he belongs!

programme.title: Total DramaRama

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Duncan is rattled when Chef, tired of having his car destroyed, buys a new one that is completely indestructible.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.sub-title: Sugar and Spice and Lightning and Frights
programme.desc: When two new kids show up at the daycare Duncan and Leshawna take issue with, not what makes them different, but what makes them similar to the newbies.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Elmore residents are going missing and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. A breaking news report tells the Wattersons that their neighbour is among the several mysterious disappearances happening across Elmore. Their search for clues leads them to find a strange egg which they soon discover belongs to their own Evil Turtle. The family realise that its their responsibility to track down their pet before she and her brood do more damage to the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin agree to do all of Tobiass chores in exchange for good points! Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias is doing way better than them in an online game called Galatrek. Tobias admits he earns "good points" doing chores for his parents which he then exchanges for dollars to buy cool stuff for Galatrek. If Gumball and Darwin do Tobias chores they can earn his "good points" and use them for Galatrek. Gumball and Darwin think theyve hit the jackpot. But these "good points" may not be quite as good as Tobias claims...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Rocky suggests that the Elmore Junior High kids skip school, the bus is boarded by criminals who seem to want to teach them the importance of school attendance. The masked culprits are clearly the childrens parents, faking a heist to teach them a lesson. But when the police get involved for real, it becomes clear the parents arent the ones pulling the strings.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: As night falls in Elmore the Moon takes us on a tour through the various dreams - and nightmares - of the towns slumbering inhabitants. Each characters dream shows us their innermost desires their greatest fears or just how plain weird they are.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwin discover his diploma is fake Principal Brown is determined to keep their discovery a secret. / Gumball is late to meet Penny at the mall, but a series of misunderstandings on the way only delay him further.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons try and reconnect Darwin to his fish roots. When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isnt fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. So the family try to re-connect him with his aquatic culture; they try fish-food fish-language even fish clothes. But when none of it works they realize they may have to let him go.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

Gumball, Darwin and Anais have to battle their way through town, unravelling the secrets of their new virtual reality. But theyll have to level up if theyre going to stand any chance against the mysterious final boss...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The family go to visit Richards Dad. Based on his basic living standards and extended absence from Richards life, they assume Frankie must have done a stretch in the slammer. When Frankie comes to stay with the Wattersons, they decide the way to make him comfortable is to make him uncomfortable and turn their house into a prison.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

Then they find out this copycat family is making money online from imitating the Watterson family! When they fail to encourage them to find their own identity, the Wattersons realise they need a more permanent solution...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwin realise Grandpa Louie has no friends on Elmore Plus, they feel bad. So they create one - called Muriel. However when Granny Jojo finds out Louie has been spending time online with another woman, Muriel not existing isnt going to stop her being destroyed.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Skinny celebrate a brand new arrival to the family: a body lotion that delivers incredible speed to its wearer. Yay Science! The boys quickly include the speed lotion in their morning routine, because testing inventions on yourself is always a good idea. Then its time to get out there and nab Lamput once and for all. Results are mixed. On the one hand, the "zoom oil" certainly works. On the other hand, these nerds arent really used to having a body that can actually do things. Conclusion: the docs still fail, only this time they fail really quickly. At least they get that round the world trip they were dreaming of.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Dad has to make the kids on time for their first day back at school. But hes overslept and now he cant find Gumball, Darwin or Anais anywhere. When he finally figures out where they are, its a race against time to rescue them and prove to himself - and Mum - that hes not a bad father.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin discover that Rob, who once swore to wreak vengeance on them, has been trying to destroy them for some time. But his traps never work. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons fear the worst when they are summoned to a Town Hall meeting, but are pleasantly surprised when theyre offered a brand new house. Until they discover its in a different state! The Mayor of Elmore has decided they are bringing down the real estate value of the entire town so the family have to prove that theyre upstanding members of the community.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: No matter what Gumball does, Carmen thinks she knows better. Gumball attempts to gain the moral high ground but fails... The only option left is to bring Carmen down to his level. 15 mins, U (2011) (CC)

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Each member of the family thinks their demographic has it the toughest. Gumball and Darwin think guys have it the worst. Mom thinks women do. Anais thinks kids do. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When the kids find out that Moms life hasnt panned out exactly as shed hoped, they try to make her day a bit easier by taking on her chores. However, they accidentally grab her bucket list instead of her to-do list and end up attempting to tick off all of Nicoles life goals.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwin realise Grandpa Louie has no friends on Elmore Plus, they feel bad. So they create one - called Muriel. However when Granny Jojo finds out Louie has been spending time online with another woman, Muriel not existing isnt going to stop her being destroyed.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The orange blob is down at the Museum, nerding out about ancient Egypt, when the Docs show up and ruin Lamputs day. Darn science geeks. No respect for culture. A superior knowledge of history keeps Lamput one step ahead of the blue boffins - how many times can two chemists get kicked out of the same Museum? The Docs sneak back into the exhibition disguised as mummies. They learn the hard way that a disguise can be TOO good; they get locked into a glass box overnight. Lucky break, though; this is the night when a renowned jewel thief tries to steal the museums precious treasures. Lamput and the Docs get tangled up in the heist. The rest is history.

The Docs make the brave decision to see a therapist about these terrible dreams. In the waiting room is the last orange blob they wanted to see; apparently a life of hot pursuit is taking its toll on Lamput, too. The shrink will have to resort to some very unconventional treatments.

Theyve tracked down Coco Diablo, the head of the notorious costume crime syndicate that colludes The Black Knight, Space Kook, and the Ghost Diver. With Coco and her kitty in prison, Mystery Inc. thinks that they can finally enjoy a break. Wrong! Suddenly, menacing doppelganger ghosts of the Scooby crew and favorite classic foes show up in Coolsville to threaten Halloween. Now its up to the meddling kids - and their unlikely new partner Coco - to unmask the latest scoundrel and save Halloween! For Shaggy and Scooby-Doo, with trick-or-treating on the line - this time its personal!

programme.desc: Specs and Skinny spruce themselves up and head out to a piano concerto in the royal concert hall. Theyre on their best behavior, until they spot a fellow culture vulture who also happens to be small, orange and squishy. Honestly, theyre letting all sorts of rabble into these places these days. The Docs decide that a sleeping potion might be a quick and quiet way of capturing Lamput. Naturally things get out of hand, and when the entire audience catches a whiff of the snoozy brew, we find out exactly how hard it is to stay awake during a classical music recital. One star.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have placed giant remote-controlled hydraulic jacks under the cabin to transform it into a life-sized rolling ball game. Grizzy who in inclined to seasickness tries to put things back in place. The cabin tips over into empty space.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But hes promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match - only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and theyre willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds himself babysitting a baboon.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wickets flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day. Redbird must overcome his fear of taking baths if hes going to help Bam bring Clayface to justice.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Gothams annual dog show is tonight, and Harley plans to compete for the prized "Best in Show" ribbon. Sensing shes up to no good, Robin decides to enter rough-and-tumble Ace the Bat-Dog to keep an eye on the thieving trickster.

programme.desc: Dr. Lucas tries to make all his friends feel better but ends up under the weather himself.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas decides to paint a portrait of Arlo. But Arlo cant sit still.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas and Maizie try and help Findley learn how to dance.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Daffy invites the crew to take a mud soak in his truck bed and it turns out to be anything but relaxing.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mel grows frustrated with the things she cant do while wearing a cast, Barney creates an imaginative game for the kids to play. Throughout the game, Mel learns to embrace her abilities with the help of a fantastical robot arm.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mels pretzel is eaten by a pigeon, Barney creates a high-seas adventure to find another, but it goes awry when Captain Mel doesnt listen to her crew. Mel realizes its important to listen to others when youre working as a team.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Determined to save the community garden, Barney and the kids go on a magical adventure where they become butterflies, and help a little ladybug with a big problem. They ultimately learn that doing small things can affect big change!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

Problem is they think shes married with kittens. Tom plays the role of husband and volunteers Jerry and Tuffy to play their kittens. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Little Quaker fears his luck will turn for the worse when he inadvertently walks under a ladder. When a series of unfortunate and painful incidents happen to Tom, Jerry and Spike, but not Little Quaker, he thinks he is to blame.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

Tom happily plays the role of husband and volunteers Jerry and Tuffy to play their adorable kittens, but complications ensue when Toodles dad doesnt take to Tom, her mom coddles Jerry and Tuffy a little too much, and Toodles ex-boyfriend Butch learns that his girl got hitched.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

But when the Suck-Up takes over the house Tom and Jerry team up to defeat it. / Little Quaker fears his luck will turn for the worse when he walks under a ladder. When a series of incidents happen to everyone but Little Quaker, he thinks he is to blame. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen. But Grizzy wants to paint himself on the next painting and swipes the artwork along with the rodents paint kit. The furious Lemmings are determined to recover their material at all costs. Its the beginning of a dispute that could be qualified as… artsy!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle. The rodents catch up with it on a mystical nearby isle, where they meet five fairies. One of them breathes life into the musical instrument. The Lemmings return to the castle with five sets of enchanted pipes and catapult Grizzy far away. Its his turn to discover the mysterious isle.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy puts a stop to the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. Annoyed, they decide to banish the bear to the bottom of the castle dungeons while hes taking a nap. In his prison, Grizzy finds a magic shepherds crook. Now he can direct the neighboring sheep according to his desires. With their help, he manages to escape from his dungeon. He returns to the cabin and settles in on the flock like on a sofa, while the Lemmings stare in disbelief!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While fighting over a jelly cake, Grizzy banishes the Lemmings to the castle dungeons and the rodents discover a passageway leading to a secret elfin room. The Lemmings activate a secret mechanism, transforming their surroundings into a "heroic fantasy" world where they are elves, the sheep are goblins, and Grizzy is a magician. The jelly cake battle now takes on epic dimensions!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: At midnight, a gothic lady cat appears with her favorite sinister plant creatures including her personal favorite: Fang, a big man-eating plant. As long as its sealed in the hothouse, nothing can go wrong. But Tom, Jerry and Tuffy soon have their hands full with the escaped plant.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Cates appears and assigns Tom the job of sweeping the estates chimneys, warning him not to upset the Duchesss new exotic pet bird. Unfortunately, both the pet bird and a stork at the top of the chimney think Jerry is a worm. Soon chaos breaks out, hurting Toms cleaning efforts.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom finds out he won a contest to be in a cat food commercial, his behavior turns smug. This irritates Jerry, who goes to great lengths to ruin the commercial shoot at the house as Tom struggles in his role.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Peter, a pretentious cheapskate poodle, demands that Tom and Jerry help protect his precious sapphire egg on a train journey but wont pay their fare. The cat and mouse become stowaways and go to a lot of trouble to do their job, but the outcome is unexpected.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is under strict orders to not wake the Witch sisters but Jerry is set on getting Tom in trouble. When Tom uses the magic spell wand and makes all of the furniture come alive he must get the help of Newt to make everything go back as it was.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr. Bean. When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by a rival childs plane, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge - when the next day comes, his newly-constructed fighter plane is almost ready for take-off, but it lacks a vital part and the local model shop is shut! This doesnt matter, though - soon the plane is chocks away with Teddy at the controls and fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers theres only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majestys corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When did Mr. Bean first meet his teddy bear? Did he really learn to drive his mini at the age of ten? Could he possibly have known his battle-axe of a landlady when she was a sweet and blushing bride? Bean takes us on a journey into the past, answering these questions and giving us an inkling as to what made him the man he is today.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean cant bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The she-bear Grizzy is enamored with has lost her favorite flower in an inaccessible spot under a giant boulder. Grizzy tries to lift it: impossible! programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the rangers mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast testing every app on the rangers tablet one by one. Grizzy, who is starving, sees that the cupboards are bare. When he realizes that one GPS app can give the itinerary to the nearest chocolate spread store, Grizzy requisitions the tablet.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

programme.desc: Grizzy expels the Lemmings from the cabin where they had built a cumbersome obstacle course. Peaceful at last and feeling lazy, he is determined not to leave his couch. The Lemmings discover a magic Mayan disc that allows you to choose instantaneous mutations of other animals features: bat wings, reindeer antlers, elephant trunks, etc. The mutant Lemmings return to the cabin, determined to continue playing their game while enjoying their new accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: As they fight over the last jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings accidentally send it flying deep into the jungle. They both set out in search for the jar, but in a forest that dense, its an impossible mission. In a Mayan Temple, the Lemmings discover a magic bracelet that increases ones sense of smell tenfold and use it to find the jar. Grizzy loses their trail, but finds some Mayan bracelets himself: one for eyesight and one for hearing. Enough to infallibly track down the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Just as Grizzy is about to go to bed, he ousts the Lemmings who are holding a surprise party in the cabin. The Lemmings land in a Mayan Temple devoted to the moon. While toying with an ancestral console, the Lemmings set off a cosmic phenomenon that brings the moon, which is now the size of a disco ball, to the temple. In its aura, gravity becomes very weak. Enough to get rid of Grizzy and have a very original fiesta.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy does his best to get rid of the Lemmings and enjoy some peace and quiet in the cabin, but each time they come back with a new and even more-disturbing activity. When he sees some penguins marching in a perfectly disciplined line, Grizzy decides to teach the Lemmings how to behave in his presence. He locks himself up with them inside the garage, which has been transformed into an elementary school classroom. Grizzy is determined to make discipline reign but he has forgotten about the Lemmings natural penchant for bedlam.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight once again and cause an accident with Santa Claus sled. The Lemmings rush to the crash site and get their hands on Santas magic bag. While Grizzy is tidying up the cabin after their fight, he is baffled to see the Lemmings come back him, quiet and calm. The rodents break out into Christmas carols and prepare a delicious snack for Grizzy before slipping out again. Suspicious, Grizzy follows them and discovers that the bag rewards persons whose wishes are equal to their goodwill.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings do not agree on which program to watch on TV. Grizzy confiscates the remote-control device. He thinks hes won the battle, but the Lemmings find another one at the research station. A furious combat begins until the adversaries realize that the research station device has a special button that controls objects.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast racing down the ice slope in competition with the stuffed Bear-Ranger and manage to win each time. Grizzy cannot stand seeing his avatar humiliated and he decides to enter the competition to help him. Their frenzied descent gets out of hand and everyone is propelled all the way to the hangar of the research station, where they discover an ultra-sophisticated racing game. The racecourse sprawls over the entire icefield via drones that project holographic elements. Grizzy and the Lemmings get into super-fast snowmobiles and launch into the race of the century.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Beans phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Beans house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a crate of competition boomerangs. They rapidly become pros capable of disarming Grizzy at a distance and ejecting him from the cabin with disconcerting ease. To compete with the precision of the Lemming boomerangs, Grizzy decides to learn archery and becomes the Canadian William Tell.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Exasperated by the Lemmings who prevent him from watching his favorite TV show in peace, Grizzy catapults them out of the cabin. One of them passes through the northern lights and undergoes a strange mutation: he now has the power to control metal with his mind.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A strange new object figures prominently in the cabin: a big wall clock that resembles a Swiss cuckoo. Grizzy instantly falls in love with the regular "tick-tock," which comforts and soothes him. But when the hands strike noon, figurines come out and perform a song and dance with a flourish. The Lemmings notice that by turning the hands of the clock manually, it can be noontime every two seconds.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Woken with a start by a nightmare filled with Lemmings, Grizzy stumbles on the Rangers dream machine. Its a headphone set where you can program the theme of your choice before falling asleep within seconds for a night filled with sweet dreams. But who could possibly sleep soundly surrounded by Lemmings who want their fair share too?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto an old American India medallion bearing the symbol of the wind. He who wears it has the power to command air streams. Grizzy would be quite content to never leave the sofa again and control things from a distance, but the Lemmings want it to create fantastic new games that literally blow you away.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A magic Amerindian top modifies the mental age of anyone who watches it spin. From now on, Grizzy has the mind of a 10-month old baby. The Lemmings rapidly realize that dealing with an overgrown baby - no matter how sweet or adorable - is not exactly restful.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A magic horn lands on the muzzle of a moose, endowing it with grace and the ability to fly. It soars off, leaving a rainbow-colored streak in its wake. When Grizzy sees this strange creature, he dreams of taming it as a gift for his beloved she-bear, while the Lemmings imagine themselves playing rodeo on a bucking unicorn.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While looking for the TV remote-control device, Grizzy happens onto a box that can localize a bunch of keys thanks to its key ring, which is equipped with a tracker. Grizzy decides to stick the spy device under a jar of chocolate spread, just in case the Lemmings should decide to carry it off.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Beans trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and hes not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre - bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesnt like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he cant refuse.

programme.desc: Wilhelmina casts a "Say Yes" spell on the Wicked Witch for her grouchy attitude and suddenly her auntie starts to try new things she would never have agreed to before. programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz

He pampers the creature and grows fond of it, but the rodents want their pal back!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is pulled out of his dreams by the rambunctious Lemmings who are jousting on sheep. The sly bear gets rid of the rodents by enticing their mounts away with food. programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Beans sweet tooth leads him to despair when he bites off a bit more than he can chew. Or will the dentist despair when faced with Beans antics?

programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

When the sled hits a superheros spacecraft, a mysterious costume falls out.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
