Кеннет Коупленд утверждает, что каждый человек, который принимает Иисуса Христа своим Богом и спасителем, благодаря вере может стать успешным, получить исцеление от болезней и решение финансовых нужд.

programme.title: Измени свой мир. Рик Реннер
programme.desc: Главная особенность программы – глубокий и детальный разбор Божьего Слова. Изучение текстов оригинала Нового Завета на греческом языке поможет лучше понимать Библию, по-новому раскроет для вас многие стихи Писания. Вместе с Риком Реннером вы углубитесь в историю Библии, сможете переместиться в древний Ефес, Пергам, Смирну, Иерусалим, Вифлеем, а также во многие другие исторические места, чтобы прочувствовать обстановку, в которой авторы библейских текстов писали свои послания. Эти послания не перестали быть актуальными и сегодня!

programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley
programme.desc: Бэйлесс Конли

programme.title: Joyce Meyers program
programme.desc: Джойс Майер проповедует на самые различные темы, в том числе о силе мыслей и слов, о важности правильного мышления, о душевных состояниях человека и взаимоотношениях. Её проповеди больше напоминают искренний разговор с аудиторией — она открыто говорит о своей жизни, делится пережитым, рассказывает, чему научил её Бог, чтобы и другие могли применить эти знания и откровения к своей жизни.

programme.title: Библия 365
programme.desc: Проповеди Алексея Осокина - это ободряющее Слово Божье на каждый день. Оно поможет Вам в христианской жизни быть победителем и иметь успех. Христианская проповедь - это мотивация жить полноценной жизнью в последние дни перед Восхищением Церкви и Вторым Пришествием Иисуса Христа.

programme.title: Uskliku võiduhaal
programme.desc: Кеннет Коупленд вместе со своей супругой являются авторами и ведущими программы "Победоносный голос верующего", которую транслируют телекомпании по всему миру. Кеннет Коупленд проповедует на темы основанные на Библии о вере, любви, исцелении, процветании, искуплении, праведности и о принципах победоносной христианской жизни. Коупленд убежден, что Бог никогда не ошибается, в отличие от человека. Он считает, что человек может разговаривать с Богом даже о повседневных делах. Кеннет Коупленд утверждает, что каждый человек, который принимает Иисуса Христа своим Богом и спасителем, благодаря вере может стать успешным, получить исцеление от болезней и решение финансовых нужд.

programme.title: Измени свой мир. Рик Реннер
programme.desc: Главная особенность программы – глубокий и детальный разбор Божьего Слова. Изучение текстов оригинала Нового Завета на греческом языке поможет лучше понимать Библию, по-новому раскроет для вас многие стихи Писания. Вместе с Риком Реннером вы углубитесь в историю Библии, сможете переместиться в древний Ефес, Пергам, Смирну, Иерусалим, Вифлеем, а также во многие другие исторические места, чтобы прочувствовать обстановку, в которой авторы библейских текстов писали свои послания. Эти послания не перестали быть актуальными и сегодня!

programme.title: In Touch
programme.desc: Доктор Чарльз Ф. Стэнли является основателем In Touch Ministry, старшим пастором Первой баптистской церкви Атланты, автором бестселлеров. Мотивация доктора Чарльза Ф. Стэнли лучше всего представлена в Деяниях 20:24. Он говорит: "Жизнь ничего не стоит, если я не использую ее для выполнения работы, порученной мне Господом Иисусом - говорить другим хорошие новости о доброте Божьей и Его любви". Миссия доктора Стэнли – приводить людей по всему миру в возрастающие отношения с Иисусом Христом и укреплять поместные церкви, поэтому передача "Прикосновение" представляет собой библейские уроки, которые охватывают такие жизненно важные для христиан темы, как "Влияние верующего", "Обретение мира в сердце", "Доброта" и многие другие. В этих передачах доктор Стэнли акцентирует внимание на то, что каждый верующий должен жить христоцентричной жизнью. "Слово Божье и дело Божие, - говорит доктор Стэнли, - это то, что меняет жизнь людей". Присоединяйтесь к изучению фундаментальных основ христианства и утверждайте свою веру!

programme.title: Long Islandi meedium
programme.desc: Reality series where Theresa Caputo, a self-professed medium, claims she can communicate with dead people. Each episode demonstrates how this gift impacts her life and the lives of those around her. Theresa helps individuals connect with their departed loved ones which results in emotional, heartwarming, and sometimes heartbreaking readings with her fans and some celebrities. People are looking for a closure and piece, and Theresa helps them as much as she can.

programme.title: Long Islandi meedium
programme.desc: Reality series where Theresa Caputo, a self-professed medium, claims she can communicate with dead people. Each episode demonstrates how this gift impacts her life and the lives of those around her. Theresa helps individuals connect with their departed loved ones which results in emotional, heartwarming, and sometimes heartbreaking readings with her fans and some celebrities. People are looking for a closure and piece, and Theresa helps them as much as she can.

programme.title: Veidrad kehad
programme.desc: Body Bizarre is a documentary series presenting stories of people from all over the world who are suffering from unusual and mysterious disease states. Some of people need surgery that is so risky that the chances of survival are small. Some of the conditions are so rare and unstudied, that the best doctors are just puzzled and cant do anything to help. Discover the real stories of individuals living with the most incredible medical anomalies.

programme.title: The Baldwins
programme.desc: A look into the lives of Alec and Hilaria Baldwin and their seven children as they navigate the highs and lows of family life in the public eye.

programme.title: 90 Day
programme.desc: Six veteran 90 Day couples have reached their breaking point. From the drama of communication breakdowns, meddling families, long distance love and the highs and lows of the 90 Day visa process, these relationships have been pushed to the limit.

programme.title: Forbidden Love
programme.desc: Can You Feel The Love Tonight. Interfaith couples face the ultimate challenge when one partner gives up their beliefs, identity and values to convert to their partners religion.

programme.title: Pisipõnnid ja tiaarad
programme.desc: Explore the world of child beauty pageants of fake teeth, lip-gloss galore and hair extensions as parents dress their children up to take home the winning title. Exploring different locations around the USA, Toddlers and Tiaras shows the tantrums of children, the long hours they have to endure and the training that comes alongside being a winner. With seven seasons, TLC (The Learning Channel) have created another American reality television series that shows the realities of what it takes to become a winner in Americas child beauty pageants, and the money it takes to win!

programme.title: The Little Couple
programme.desc: Meet Bill Klein, a businessman, and Dr. Jennifer Arnold, a neonatologist, who both have skeletal dysplasia, which means they are both under 4-feet-tall, and follow their daily lives, adventures, and challenges. Tune in and see how they navigate marriage, parenthood, their careers, and being two little people in an average-sized world.

programme.title: Say Yes To the Dress UK
programme.desc: All women want to be beautiful, especially on their own wedding day. From an early age girls all over the world dream of a fairy white dress. Reality TV show Say Yes to the Dress UK shows the agency Confetti and Lace that assists brides in choosing the Gown according to any taste and purse. It is not that easy as not only the Bride must fall in love with the Gown but her friends and relatives as well. With the Welsh fashion designer David Emanuel, the designer of Princess Dianas iconic wedding dress, the host Christine Dando and their professional staff pre-wedding jitters have no chance. These experts go above and beyond to help the future brides to find the one and only wedding dress.

programme.title: Pisipõnnid ja tiaarad
programme.desc: Explore the world of child beauty pageants of fake teeth, lip-gloss galore and hair extensions as parents dress their children up to take home the winning title. Exploring different locations around the USA, Toddlers and Tiaras shows the tantrums of children, the long hours they have to endure and the training that comes alongside being a winner. With seven seasons, TLC (The Learning Channel) have created another American reality television series that shows the realities of what it takes to become a winner in Americas child beauty pageants, and the money it takes to win!

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: With an average weight of over 1000lbs, nothing can support the Slaton sisters like they can support each other. With hopes of a healthier life, the sisters embark on a journey to drop enough weight that they qualify for a life changing bariatric surgery. Without the surgery, Amy will never be able to become a mother like she dreams of, and Tammy will be bedridden. After meeting with medical experts, the sisters strive to reach their goal but drama ensues as they struggle to stick to their healthy diets. Will the Slaton sisters stay on the right track and turn their lifestyles around?

programme.title: 90 paeva pulmadeni
programme.desc: Buckle up, TLC and 90 Day Fiance fans! Hot off their upcoming appearance on 90 DAY FIANCÉ: HAPPILY EVER AFTER?, fan-favorites Pedro and Chantel and their lively in-laws will be the focal point of a spinoff series from the 90 DAY FIANCÉ franchise called THE FAMILY CHANTEL, premiering Monday nights this July. Ever since Chantel first introduced Pedro to her family under the false pretense of him coming to America on a student visa, the drama that followed has kept fans obsessed. From their beginnings on 90 DAY FIANCÉ season four through 90 DAY FIANCÉ: HAPPILY EVER AFTER, Pedro and Chantel have weathered major marital ups and downs involving everything from feisty family members to their own trust issues. Viewers will follow this unique modern family as they try to move past their differences and come together as an extended family, but as Chantels parents Karen and Thomas try to protect their brood, will they push their children too far? The family members featured in the upcoming series include Chantels parents Karen and Thomas and siblings River and Winter, as well as Pedros mother Lidia and sister Nicole.

programme.title: The Baldwins
programme.desc: A look into the lives of Alec and Hilaria Baldwin and their seven children as they navigate the highs and lows of family life in the public eye.

programme.title: Taylor Swift vs Scooter Braun
programme.desc: Scooter Braun received death threats when Taylor Swift criticized him for buying her masters. Is he the villain or the victim of the Swifty fan army?

programme.desc: Meet Bill Klein, a businessman, and Dr. Jennifer Arnold, a neonatologist, who both have skeletal dysplasia, which means they are both under 4-feet-tall, and follow their daily lives, adventures, and challenges. programme.title: Return to Amish
programme.desc: American reality television series, a spin-off and continuation series to Breaking Amish, that features original cast members- Abe and Rebecca Schmucker, Jeremiah Raber, and Sabrina High, who return to Pennsylvania and try to adjust to living in their Amish communities once again, facing new struggles as they come to terms with the fact that life doesnt get any easier after leaving communities behind. We also get to meet some new and interesting people, friends and family members of the original cast and follow the life of Kate Stoltz who decided to stay in New York and pursue her modeling career.

programme.title: 90 Day Fiance
programme.desc: American reality series, a follow-up spinoff of 90 Day Fiance that features couples who have applied for or received a K-1 visa (available uniquely to foreign fiances of U.S. citizens) and have ninety days to marry each other, follows some of the most famous and interesting couples from the original show and documents the ups and downs of their relationships after they got married. For some of these couples, the real drama is just starting because they barely know each other and they have to battle critics, doubters, and various obstacles on their road to love. Some of the couples that are featured on the show are Danielle and Mohamed, Melanie and Devar, Loren and Alexei, Kyle and Noon, Brett and Daya and Russ and Paola.

programme.title: Alta Infedeltà
programme.desc: Reality Show - Ep. 21. How does a scorned lover react when their partner is revealed to be a traitor? This show re-enacts the betrayals, secrets and lies that lead couples to breaking point.

programme.title: Alta Infedeltà

programme.title: Minu elu ulekaalulisena
programme.desc: Ever thought you ought to lose a few pounds? These 600lb individuals certainly have, and are about to undergo a year long fitness and diet regime in a desperate attempt to get their weight under control again. Patients are placed under the care of Iranian-American surgeon, Doctor Now, who trains them in the ways of a healthy diet, before aiding their journey with surgery if they need it by means of gastric bypass surgery or sleeve gastrectomy. Follow each person on their journey to a healthy weight.

programme.title: Botched Bariatric
programme.desc: Tired of dealing with explosive bowels, Sean asks Dr. Hodges for help. A botched surgery left Latoya with a 10-pound lymphedema between her legs.

programme.desc: Booked for a group reading in New York, Theresa and the family decide take a day trip to the Big Apple. But will the hustle and bustle of the city disrupt Theresas abilities?

programme.desc: Buckle up, TLC and 90 Day Fiance fans! Hot off their upcoming appearance on 90 DAY FIANCÉ: HAPPILY EVER AFTER?, fan-favorites Pedro and Chantel and their lively in-laws will be the focal point of a spinoff series from the 90 DAY FIANCÉ franchise called THE FAMILY CHANTEL, premiering Monday nights this July. Ever since Chantel first introduced Pedro to her family under the false pretense of him coming to America on a student visa, the drama that followed has kept fans obsessed. From their beginnings on 90 DAY FIANCÉ season four through 90 DAY FIANCÉ: HAPPILY EVER AFTER, Pedro and Chantel have weathered major marital ups and downs involving everything from feisty family members to their own trust issues. Viewers will follow this unique modern family as they try to move past their differences and come together as an extended family, but as Chantels parents Karen and Thomas try to protect their brood, will they push their children too far? The family members featured in the upcoming series include Chantels parents Karen and Thomas and siblings River and Winter, as well as Pedros mother Lidia and sister Nicole.

programme.title: The Little Couple
programme.desc: Meet Bill Klein, a businessman, and Dr. Jennifer Arnold, a neonatologist, who both have skeletal dysplasia, which means they are both under 4-feet-tall, and follow their daily lives, adventures, and challenges. Tune in and see how they navigate marriage, parenthood, their careers, and being two little people in an average-sized world.

programme.title: Alta Infedeltà
programme.desc: Reality Show - Ep. 23. How does a scorned lover react when their partner is revealed to be a traitor? This show re-enacts the betrayals, secrets and lies that lead couples to breaking point.

programme.title: Alta Infedeltà
programme.desc: How does a scorned lover react when their partner is revealed to be a traitor? Dramatic reconstructions depict the betrayals, secrets and lies leading couples to breaking point.

programme.title: The Bad Foot Clinic
programme.desc: Knock Your Socks Off. Marion solves the mystery of the V-shaped gap in Debras toes. And she has a surprising treatment for a psoriasis patient to stop the itch.

programme.title: Minu elu ulekaalulisena
programme.desc: Ever thought you ought to lose a few pounds? These 600lb individuals certainly have, and are about to undergo a year long fitness and diet regime in a desperate attempt to get their weight under control again. Patients are placed under the care of Iranian-American surgeon, Doctor Now, who trains them in the ways of a healthy diet, before aiding their journey with surgery if they need it by means of gastric bypass surgery or sleeve gastrectomy. Follow each person on their journey to a healthy weight.

programme.title: Long Islandi meedium
programme.desc: Larry is planning a surprise party for Theresas birthday, but will the spirits give her the heads up? Plus, Erna hopes to make contact with her dead daughter.

programme.title: Long Islandi meedium
programme.desc: Dan and Helen have a private reading in the hope of making contact with their dead son Alex. Plus, is it time for Theresa to hire an assistant?

programme.title: Veidrad kehad
programme.desc: Uncovering stories of people round the world who suffer from rare and mysterious medical conditions. Some require surgery so complex that the odds of survival are minimal at best.

programme.title: The Bad Foot Clinic
programme.desc: Knock Your Socks Off. Marion solves the mystery of the V-shaped gap in Debras toes. And she has a surprising treatment for a psoriasis patient to stop the itch.

programme.title: Minu elu ulekaalulisena
programme.desc: Ever thought you ought to lose a few pounds? These 600lb individuals certainly have, and are about to undergo a year long fitness and diet regime in a desperate attempt to get their weight under control again. Follow each person on their journey to a healthy weight.

programme.title: Pisipõnnid ja tiaarad
programme.desc: Explore the world of child beauty pageants of fake teeth, lip-gloss galore and hair extensions as parents dress their children up to take home the winning title. Exploring different locations around the USA, Toddlers and Tiaras shows the tantrums of children, the long hours they have to endure and the training that comes alongside being a winner. With seven seasons, TLC (The Learning Channel) have created another American reality television series that shows the realities of what it takes to become a winner in Americas child beauty pageants, and the money it takes to win!

programme.title: The Little Couple
programme.desc: Meet Bill Klein, a businessman, and Dr. Jennifer Arnold, a neonatologist, who both have skeletal dysplasia, which means they are both under 4-feet-tall, and follow their daily lives, adventures, and challenges. Tune in and see how they navigate marriage, parenthood, their careers, and being two little people in an average-sized world.

programme.title: The Holzer Files
programme.desc: Based on the real life files of Americas first ghost hunter, Dr. Hans Holzer (whose most famous case concerned the Lutz family of Amityville, NY), this show follows a team of paranormal investigators as they reexamine the terrifying tales that mystified the doctor. The team consists of paranormal investigator Dave Schrader, psychic medium Cindy Kaza and equipment technician Shane Pittman and they are aided by Holzers daughter, Alexandra. They examine thousands of documents, letters, photographs, and audio and visual recordings, sometimes going as far back as the 50s. Following on from where Holzer left off, the team bring the investigations up to the present day and visit the locations of the supernatural events such as the Peck House, the Morris-Jumel Mansion, the Whaley House, and the USS Constellation.

programme.title: Kummituslik varjupaik
programme.desc: Featuring a fearless crew on a quest to hunt down chain-rattling ghosts and scary apparitions in anyway they can, Ghost Asylum follows a passionate paranormal team in America, the Tennessee Wraith Chasers (TWC) as they attempt to "trap ghosts" in the countrys most haunted abandoned asylums, mental hospitals and sanitariums. Using their Sourthern charm and engineering knowledge to create supernatural inventions during their hunting to find ghosts or spirits of any kind. Their speciality is investigating the decaying, haunting and skin crawling mental institutions throughout the USA, warning viewers that they have permission to enter the most haunted buildings and that chasing ghosts without proper training "will get you killed", so dont try this at home.

programme.title: Destination Fear
programme.desc: This paranormal reality series follows explorer and ghost hunter Dakota Laden who partners up his sister Chelsea and best friend Tanner, to travel across the country in an RV and visit the most haunted locations in America -dark corridors of Brushy Mountain State Penitentiary, notorious Eloise Psychiatric Hospital, terrifying St. Albans Sanatorium and many more, as they learn the blood-chilling stories behind this scary places and face their darkest fears.

programme.title: Hotel Secrets and Legends
programme.sub-title: Mad Scientist Hollywood Scandal and Outlaws End
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates the secrets and legends hidden in the rooms of many hotels, motels and resorts in America. With two million hotel rooms occupied every night in America, its no wonder that some of the most captivating tales have occurred in hotels. Each episode includes dramatic recreations featuring actors re-telling the most mysterious, outrageous and strange stories and legends from Americas history that have occurred either inside the rooms, or near famous and even not-so-famous hotels.

programme.title: Legends of the Lost with Megan Fox
programme.desc: Documentary series, hosted and co-created by actress Megan Fox, that follows her on an epic and personal journey across the world, where she will, with the help from archaeologists and experts, and analysing priceless texts and fascinating artifacts, try to find answers to the age-old mysteries that still torture scientists and archaeologists to this day. Among other themes, the series will consider whether female Amazon warriors really existed, whether the Trojan War was an historical event, and the mysteries of Stonehenge.

programme.title: Alaska Monsters
programme.desc: The team investigates the Otterman who is believed to have the ability to shape-shift. Todd builds a Ring of Fire trap, while the rest of the team utilises an airboat.

programme.title: Alaska Monsters
programme.desc: The team heads deep into the Alaskan Interior outside of Fairbanks to investigate reports of a gigantic bear-like creature known as the Northern Giant.

programme.title: Paranormal Declassified
programme.desc: Unexplained sea creatures… evil shapeshifters… extra-terrestrial visits… demonic activity… In this supernatural documentary series, the journalist Paul Beban investigates all these mysterious phenomena and more. Beban looks back through history at some of the most baffling cases of supposed paranormal activity and cryptozoological encounters – and seeks to find the truth.

programme.title: The Alaska Triangle
programme.desc: Experts and eyewitnesses attempt to unlock the mystery of the Alaska Triangle, a remote area infamous for alien abductions, Bigfoot sightings, paranormal phenomena and vanishing airplanes. Throughout the series, we meet a woman whose idyllic Alaskan dream soon descends into a paranormal nightmare, as she starts to suffer attacks by an unseen force. Recent sightings may prove that a Native American legend about a mysterious race of giants is true. The series also explores The Missing Douglas and whether an interdimensional portal in the Alaska Triangle led to the disappearance of the airplane carrying 44 military personnel in 1950.

programme.title: The Alaska Triangle
programme.desc: Experts and eyewitnesses attempt to unlock the mystery of the Alaska Triangle, a remote area infamous for alien abductions, Bigfoot sightings, paranormal phenomena and vanishing airplanes. programme.title: Aliens In Alaska
programme.desc: Documentary examining why Alaska has so many purported UFO sightings, abductions and alien encounters. The USAs largest state is a vast, uninhabited land, and has the third-lowest population of any of its compatriot states. So why does a place with so few people have so many reports of alien activity? Aided by witness testimonies and extraordinary new evidence, this show aims to shed light on Alaskas extraterrestrial events.

programme.title: Aliens In Alaska
programme.desc: Documentary examining why Alaska has so many purported UFO sightings, abductions and alien encounters. Aided by witness testimonies and extraordinary new evidence, this show aims to shed light on Alaskas extraterrestrial events.

programme.title: Alien Highway
programme.desc: Thrilling documentary series that follows Chuck Zukowski, a former Colorado law enforcement officer, who has been researching and investigating UFO-related incidents for over 30 years, his son Daniel Zukowski and investigator Heather Taddy, as they search for proof of alien life, investigate reports of UFO-related incidents across America, trying to find evidence that others have missed, while listening to some of the witnesses that were afraid to come forward until now. The team will have many adventures- they will search for the infamous Skinwalker, go on a treasure hunt of a lifetime when they receive a mysterious map, attempt to find an alien that reportedly escaped from Area 51, investigate energy vortexes, and have many other paranormal and UFO-related activities.

programme.title: Alien Highway

programme.title: Portals To Hell
programme.desc: Growing up around Ozzy Osbourne must have been, at times, a frightening ordeal for Jack Osbourne, however that hasnt stopped the son of the Prince of Darkness teaming up with paranormal investigator Katrina Weidman, to explore infamous, haunted locations. In each episode of this frightening reality series, Jack and Katrina head to a new place with a chilling history, and each sinister site is said to be a portal to the depths of the underworld. With the help of a team of experts and armed with unique technology, the pair thoroughly examine each new haunting site, hoping to unearth the truth behind their respective mysterious pasts.

programme.title: Suletud uste taga
programme.desc: Two seasoned ghost hunters, Nick Groff and Katrina Weidman, present this reality show which investigates tales of the paranormal. In order to prove, or disprove, the presence of otherworldly souls, our two hosts spend 72 hours straight living alongside the spirits in some of the most haunted places in the US. By doing so, they believe that they will be contacted by the beings on the other side. From New Yorks darkly foreboding Wildwood Sanitarium to the eerily silent halls of Ohios Higginsport School and the creepy Trans-Allegheny Lunatic Asylum in West Virginia, Nick and Katrina brave the chilling atmospheres to gather as much information as they can about the previous, long-departed occupants.

programme.title: Ghost Stalkers
programme.desc: Whispers Estate. Reports of violent hauntings drive John and Chad to investigate a possible portal at the Whispers Estate in Mitchell, Indiana. Is something evil at work?

programme.title: Ghost Nation
programme.desc: Hair-rising American reality series that follows paranormal investigators Jason Hawes, Steve Gonsalves and Dave Tango, known from the Ghost Hunters television series, as they respond to calls from people who need their help with the cases of reportedly haunted locations around the United States. The guys are members of the paranormal investigation group- T.A.P.S., which Hawes founded, and they helped to create United Paranormal Research Organization (UPRO), which aims to be a global paranormal investigation organization that keeps local organizations connected. Using state-of-the-art technology, strict methodology and local contacts, the team tracks down the source of the unexplained phenomena and cracks each outrageous case.

programme.title: Kindred Spirits
programme.desc: Thrilling American paranormal docu-reality series that follows investigators Amy Bruni and Adam Berry who visit various haunted homes across the country in order to help people who are tormented by the spirits of their late relatives. These families are scared by the mysterious occurences and they will seek help from this amazing ghost-hunting duo. Amy and Adam will try to find evidence of paranormal presence, contact the spirits and provide closure for the featured family.

programme.title: The Haunted Museum
programme.desc: A student fights for his sanity after receiving a cursed television from Americas most infamous cult leader. Can he resist the dark pull of the gift?

programme.title: Terror in the Woods
programme.sub-title: It Came From the Woods And the Lakehouse
programme.desc: The great outdoors is full of mystery and beauty, but nobody expects to run into paranormal entities or monstrous creatures during a normal day out. This documentary series examines terrifying tales where individuals have found themselves coming into contact with unexplained phenomena. What was supposed to be a pleasant trip soon turns into a nightmare, and with dramatic reconstructions, their frightening ordeals are brought to life. Each episode explores a respective story, featuring interviews with the individuals involved alongside the re-enactments.

programme.title: The Holzer Files

programme.title: Beyond the Unknown
programme.desc: Don Wildman explores extraordinary stories in this riveting documentary series, delving into myths, legends, and local tales to reveal the truth behind a number of perplexing tales. His adventures take him all across the American landscape as he attempts to get to the bottom of some of historys most intriguing stories, examining astonishing and implausible events. Each episode focusses on a variety of inextricable events, using interviews, archive footage, and dramatised re-enactments to portray the implausible. Let Don take you Beyond the Unknown; a world of bizarre occurrences, peculiarities, sinister evils, and unsolved happenings.

programme.title: Most Terrifying Places in America
programme.sub-title: Most Terrifying Places In America - Devils Playground
programme.desc: Not necessarily gun-filled cities or murderous towns, the most terrifying places America are usually haunted by supernatural entities. In this documentary series we travel across the entire United States to visit these frightening landmarks, towns and places, meeting with the locals who are adamant of a ghosts existence. These spooky places will send a shiver up your spine, not least the truth behind the stories that led to the ghosts appearing. From hangings, suicides and evil murderers, these gruesome crimes have turned into horrifying hauntings.

programme.title: Suletud uste taga
programme.desc: Two seasoned ghost hunters, Nick Groff and Katrina Weidman, present this reality show which investigates tales of the paranormal. In order to prove, or disprove, the presence of otherworldly souls, our two hosts spend 72 hours straight living alongside the spirits in some of the most haunted places in the US. By doing so, they believe that they will be contacted by the beings on the other side. From New Yorks darkly foreboding Wildwood Sanitarium to the eerily silent halls of Ohios Higginsport School and the creepy Trans-Allegheny Lunatic Asylum in West Virginia, Nick and Katrina brave the chilling atmospheres to gather as much information as they can about the previous, long-departed occupants.

programme.title: Ghost Stalkers
programme.desc: Whispers Estate. Reports of violent hauntings drive John and Chad to investigate a possible portal at the Whispers Estate in Mitchell, Indiana. Is something evil at work?

programme.title: The Holzer Files
programme.desc: Based on the real life files of Americas first ghost hunter, Dr. Hans Holzer (whose most famous case concerned the Lutz family of Amityville, NY), this show follows a team of paranormal investigators as they reexamine the terrifying tales that mystified the doctor. The team consists of paranormal investigator Dave Schrader, psychic medium Cindy Kaza and equipment technician Shane Pittman and they are aided by Holzers daughter, Alexandra. They examine thousands of documents, letters, photographs, and audio and visual recordings, sometimes going as far back as the 50s. Following on from where Holzer left off, the team bring the investigations up to the present day and visit the locations of the supernatural events such as the Peck House, the Morris-Jumel Mansion, the Whaley House, and the USS Constellation.

programme.title: Minu uus kodu
programme.desc: Dorsetis seisavad Sue ja Roy silmitsi raske otsusega. Nad peavad otsustama, kas jaada oma erakordsesse basseiniga majja elama või kolid ara. Sue on valmis kolima vaiksemasse koju, aga ta teab, et nad ei saa maja praeguses olekus maha muua.

programme.title: Meeleheitel koduperenaised
programme.desc: Lynette ja Tom raagivad Porterile vastutusest lapse ees. Susan on õnnelik, et saab lapselast hoida, Lynette aga tunneb kadedust. Orson ja Bree valmistuvad reisiks, kui paljastub Orsoni seotus salaparaste kirjade ja Chucki mõrvaga. Gabrielle puuab Royd ja McCluskeyt kokku sokutada ja saab teada McCluskey vahist. Reneel on ebameeldiv konflikt Donnyga.

programme.title: Naise kattemaks
programme.desc: Volkan saab teada, et Aras tõi Asya haiglasse. Derin utleb Jirenile, et paneb Volkani kahetsema. Aras ja Volkan tulitsevad. Haiglast ilmub artikkel.

programme.title: Papad Mammad
programme.desc: Papade ja Mammade tooelu laheb kolinal allamage. Ulla kaotab too. Vollil tekib kiusatus võtta altkaemaksu ja massib ennast tasapisi suurtesse jamadesse. Ulla on veendunud, et Juri petab teda koolidirektoriga ja langeb masendusse. Mitskin on tagasi, et oma kokku keeratud jamad ara klaarida.

programme.title: Padjaklubi
programme.desc: Maria elu muutub too juures veelgi segasemaks, sest toole võetakse vastiku kolleegi Karmeni veelgi vastikum ema. Kristina on suures kriisis: ta oma segase suhte tõttu toolt ara tulnud ja tema sarav juhiabikarjaar on akki otsa saanud. Laura hakkab saama ahistavaid SMSe ja arvab teadvat, kes selle taga on. Misha on vahepeal uhistu esimehe oma kapa alla saanud ja tundub, et uhistuga paistavad lood helgemad - aga see on kõigest vaikus enne tõelist tormi.

programme.title: Power Hit Radio
programme.desc: Power Hit Radio - NON. STOP. MUSIC.

programme.title: Kirgede kaevandus
programme.desc: Gigi palub Sebastianilt abi. Leonardo palub Saral lubada tal oma lapse elust osa saada. Nico kasib Robertal Maria Jose vabastada. Aleida ja Danilo naitavad Emiliale ta hauda.

programme.title: Vaprad ja ilusad
programme.desc: Brooke ullatab Ridgei. Ridge seisab silmitsi raske otsusega.

programme.title: Kes on mu issi?
programme.desc: Üksikema tunnistab, et oli poja eostamisel kahe erineva mehega intiimne, kuid on kindel, et ta endine kihlatu on lapse bioloogiline isa.

programme.title: Skandaal
programme.desc: Gladiaatorid vaatavad olukorda kaugelt ning riigid ule maailma hakkavad Olivia kohta pakkumisi tegema. Andrew ja Fitz satuvad keerulisse olukorda.

programme.title: Armastus
programme.desc: Hoogsa sundmustikuga romantilise seriaali Armastus avaosas kohtub miljonar Kivi tutar Sandra uusi valjakutseid otsiva maapoisi Martiniga. Piisab ainsast pilgust, laitmaks noorte sudameis armastust, kuid eneseteadlik Sandra ei taha tunnistada tõmmet lihtsa kelneri poole, poiss aga ei julge uskuda, et suutis kaunis ja uhkes tutarlapses tundeid aratada. Kaimas on ettevalmistused Kuldar Kivi sunnipaeva suurejooneliseks tahistamiseks. Lesestunud arimehe uus valjavalitu, verinoor kaunitar Karin, puuab Kuldari taiskasvanud poegadele ja tutar Sandrale tõestada, et nuud on tema selles majas perenaine. Sunnipaevapidu saab sisse tõelise hoo ja lõppeb pauguga. Sandra sudamesse jaab Martinit meenutama magus igatsus ning soov taas kohtuda. Suurima armastusloo toovad ekraanile Marko Matvere, Lisabet Loigu, Oskar Seeman, Desiree Mumm, Grete Paia jt. Režissoor Henrik Normann, stsenarist Ivo Parbus.

programme.title: Minu uus kodu
programme.desc: Dorsetis seisavad Sue ja Roy silmitsi raske otsusega. Nad peavad otsustama, kas jaada oma erakordsesse basseiniga majja elama või kolid ara. Sue on valmis kolima vaiksemasse koju, aga ta teab, et nad ei saa maja praeguses olekus maha muua.

programme.title: Padjaklubi
programme.desc: Tudrukud panevad pead kokku, et tabarast olukorrast valja rabeleda: neil on napud põhjas, aga kiiresti on vaja uuriraha kokku saada ja lisaks tuleb uhistu esimehega ara leppida. Miša peab korraks tõeliseks naiseks hakkama, et armuvalus uhistu esimees Jura lõksu tõmmata ja Laura leiab tudrukutele kahtlase toootsa. Kristina tahab oma unelmate mehega uuesti leppida, aga korraldab talle kogemata tõelise veresauna. Maria ja Marguse suhe muutub segasemaks, kui Margus uritab too juures Maria eest seista ja paneb oma tookoha ohtu. Viimaks kulastab aga tudrukuid paris ehtne staar.

programme.title: Parim moelooja
programme.desc: Disainerid peavad paaris tootades looma uuendusliku avangardi valimuse, mis tõstab esile uhe kõige trendikama ja keerukama materjali - kunstkarusnaha. Kulaliskohtunikuna astub ules kaasaegse avangardmoe ikoon Billy Porter.

programme.title: Kõige kohutavamad kokad
programme.desc: Võistlejad ning Anne Burrell ja Tyler Florence mangivad fannide lemmikmangu. Osalejad juhendavad kokkasid, kuidas teha rooga, mida nad ei saa naha, maitsta ega katsuda. Hiljem õpetavad Anne ja Tyler, kuidas ise ravioole teha. Kokahakatised panevad end proovile ja kaks kõige nõrgemat lahevad duellile.

programme.title: 80 paevaga umber maailma
programme.desc: Kihutades labi Kaljumaestiku, laseb Fogg napisõnalisel seadusemehel ja ta vangil kasutada uuritud bussi. Fogg ei tea aga, et vangi kaaslased teda jalitavad, mis viib enne paikeseloojangut vagivaldse võitluseni.

programme.title: Papad Mammad
programme.desc: Vollit ootab taas kulaskaik konstaabli juurde ning seoses sellega tuleb ilmsiks tema taielik ebapadevus haldusjuhi ametiks. Ulla proovib Jurit usaldada ja temaga ara leppida. Asjade kulg ei meeldi direktorile sugugi ja tuleb korralik tuli. Lisaks muudele jamadele, astub areenile Mitskini kadunud vend ja temaga seotud minevik, mida esialgu keegi meenutadagi ei taha.

programme.desc: Sebastian veenab El Tigret võtma Roberta ta partneriks.

programme.title: Vaprad ja ilusad
programme.desc: Finn peab otsustama, kas ta raagib Steffyle tõtt või mitte. Ridgei ja Taylori vahel on eriline hetk.

programme.title: Kaubamaja

Tomi tudruksõber Jane jahmatab Lynettei Penny sunnipaevapeol. Carlos kaitub esimesel toopaeval veidralt ja Gaby on mures.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Armastusesaar hõlmab gruppi võitslejaid, keda nimetatakse saarlasteks. Nad elavad valismaailmast eraldatuna Mallorca villas ja on pideva videovalve all. Villas ellujaamiseks peavad saarlased olema paaris mõne teise saarlasega ning sooritama erinevaid valjakutseid. Võitnud paar saab endale 56 000 eurot.

programme.title: Skandaal
programme.desc: Gladiaatorid võitlevad Olivia paastmise nimel. Valge Maja kardab, et nad võivad Oliviast lõplikult ilma jaada.

programme.title: Armastus
programme.desc: Hoogsa sundmustikuga romantilise seriaali teises osas teatab Kuldar, et tutar Sandra on võetud vastu Londoni ulikooli, neiu ei mõtle aga muule, kui isa sunnipaeval kohatud Martinile. Juhuslikult saavad noored taas kokku ja peale kirglikku suudlust ei suuda nad enam teineteisest lahkuda. Martin viib Sandra paika, kus nad saavad olla kahekesi, eemal inimestest ja tuutust argipaevast. Martinit ihaldav maatudruk Keiu laheb põgenevat paarikest silmates endast valja. Noormehe ema Marta lubab, et paneb pojale mõistuse pahe. Kuldar Kivi nooruke naine Karin poordub arsti poole, et saada selgust, miks ta lapseootele ei jaa. Kuid kõik see ei lahe korda Sandrale ja Martinile, kes naudivad teineteise lahedust ja armastuse imet.

programme.title: Minu uus kodu
programme.desc: Lancingis võitlevad Gloria ja Tom selle ule, kas jaada paigale või liikuda edasi oma viktoriaanlikust pool mere aarest. Kolme vaikese lapse, vaid kolme magamistoa ja keerulise planeeringuga Gloria soovib meeleheitlikult maha muua ja kuhugi suuremasse kohta kolida.

programme.title: Padjaklubi
programme.desc: Tudrukud mõtlevad paaniliselt, kuidas korterisse edasi jaada: uhistu esimehega on vaja leppida ja Miša asemele on vaja uut uurilist. Nad heidavad liisku ja Maria peab ise uhistu esimehe ara lepitama, see tekitab aga uue ja veel suurema probleemi. Ka Maria segased suhted asja tookoha kaotanud Margusega muutuvad veelgi segasemaks, kui Margus arvab, et Maria petab teda Jaan Pehkiga. Laura kardab, et teda jalitab ohtlik maniakk, Kristina surub ennast Lauraga peole kaasa ja kohtub seal kellegagi. Kadunud Miša ilmub ootamatult tagasi. Lõpuks helistab aga vihane maakler ja tahab teada, mis jamaga tema korteris tegeldakse.

programme.title: Minu imeline muutumine
programme.desc: Tiia unistuseks on ilusam ja noorem valimus ja põhjuseid selleks on kullaga. Tiia soovib olla ilusam, sest teda on tema suure ja kongus nina parast terve elu noritud. Tiia sai hiljuti emaks ja ta tahaks oma viiekumnenda sunnipaeva eel endale ka siledamat nagu, et mitte ainult olla ema, vaid nii ka valja naha. Praegu pelgab ta, et teda võidakse tutrekese vanaemaks pidada. Tiial on uks unistus veel, ta loodab, et kui saab endale kaunima valimuse, siis ehk kappab ka prints kohale ja Tiia ellu tuleb taas armastus.

programme.title: Uurija Vera
programme.desc: Pereisa Wolfgang Ackermann tuleb oosel koju ja leiab oma naise Diana koogist surnuna. Kõik viitab sissemurdmisele. Paari kaks last, Sophie ja Marlon, olid hiilinud majast valja ja naasevad alles parast politsei saabumist. Paul Bohmer peab tuvastama kõik võimalikud kahtlusalused.

programme.title: Buduaar
programme.desc: Kaasahaarav ning humoorikas telesaade Buduaar toob Sinuni selle kõige kuumemad ilu-, moe- ja elustiili uudised. Ülipõnevate avastuste ja kasulike nõuannetega vurtsitatud telesaadet juhib iluhoolik ja jumestuskunstnik Reet Harmat.

programme.title: Papad Mammad
programme.desc: Lenna tahab matkama minna ja Volli pakub valja, et laheks siis juba ooseks metsa. Mõeldud tehtud, aga askeetlikud tingimused ja Volli ulihalb korraldus ajab naispere endast valja. Volli ei jata jonni ja kavatseb kasvõi uksi metsamajja jaada. Mitskini vend võlub tasapisi Vaiket ja Ullat. Juri ja Volli teevad endale kogu Eesti rahva ees lolliks.

programme.title: Vintis vanemad
programme.desc: USA 2019 komoodia. Frank ja Nancy Teagarten on abielupaar, kelle elus naib kõik sujuvat. Sõiduriistaks laikiv, must maastur, elupaigaks maitsekas villa, tutar alustamas õpinguid maitsekas kolledžis. Paraku pole elu nii roosiline, kui arvata võiks, sest reaalsuse kulm dušš toob paari arusaamisele, et nende majanduslik seis on lausa katastroofiline! Muretu elustiili poolt kaasatoodud probeelmide lahendamiseks hakkavad Frank ja Nancy valja mõtlema jarjest jaburamaid skeeme, mis ei saa hasti lõppeda. Lisaks sellele jatkub neil aega oma salahobile ehk alkoholile. Lavastaja: Fred Wolf Osades:Salma Hayek, Joe Manganiello, Bridget Moynahan, Alec Baldwin

programme.title: Dunastia
programme.desc: Carringtonid langetavad lõpliku otsuse. Liitlased pannakse proovile ning sunged saladused kerkivad pinnale.

programme.title: Üheksa võhivõõrast
programme.desc: Kõigil on aeg uletada kunnis ja astuda silmitsi oma deemonitega, sealhulgas Mašaga. Aga kas nad jõuavad teisele poole?

programme.title: Suur lotokolmapaev
programme.desc: Suur lotokolmapaev toob korraga tele-ekraanidele lõbusa peremangu "Rooside sõda" ja ka Eesti suurimad lotovõidud! Kristjan Jõekalda juhtimisel kingib saade igal nadalal juurde tuhandeid lotovõitjaid ja igal aastal jagatakse lotomangijate vahel laiali miljoneid eurosid! Naudi lõbusat meelelahutust ja loosiõnne igal lotokolmapaeval!

programme.title: TV3 uudised
programme.desc: "TV3 uudised" on nuud igal argiõhtul eetris tunnise saatena. Olulisemad paevasundmused toome vaatajateni koos taiendavate lisakommentaaride ja erinevaid vaatenurki avava analuusiga. Uudistesaate juhid on Liina Kanarbik, Marek Lindmaa, Sander Terras, Liisa Aadussoo.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Mary avastab, et Edith andis suursaadikule Pamuki surmast teada. Cora teatab oma rasedusest. Thomas ja OBrien mõtlevad Batesi vastu uue laimu valja.

programme.title: TV3 uudised
programme.desc: "TV3 uudised" on nuud igal argiõhtul eetris tunnise saatena. Olulisemad paevasundmused toome vaatajateni koos taiendavate lisakommentaaride ja erinevaid vaatenurki avava analuusiga. Uudistesaate juhid on Liina Kanarbik, Marek Lindmaa, Sander Terras, Liisa Aadussoo.

programme.title: Janku Juss
programme.desc: Janku Juss on vahva animafilm uhe janese perekonna igapaevastest toimetustest. Seda kõike vahvas ja harivas võtmes.

programme.title: Kirgede torm
programme.desc: Natalia ullatab Vincentit. Ana nõuab, et Vincent vabandaks Philippi ees. Nicole teeb Helenele selgeks, et Gunther on temasse armunud. Valentinal on idee, kuidas Michaelit aidata.

programme.title: Võidustuudio
programme.desc: Võidustuudio on interaktiivne telemang, kus vaatajad saavad osaleda võistlusel, helistades ekraanil olevale telefoninumbrile ja võisteldes teleriekraanil kuvatava rahalise auhinna eest. Võidustuudio mangusaate mangud põhinevad teadmistel ja oskustel. Mangud on avatud kõigile taiskasvanutele. Võta osa ja võid olla uks võitjatest!

programme.title: Kahevõitlus
programme.desc: Haarav ja humoorikas "Kahevõitlus" sobib igale hakkajale inimesele, sest raskeid malumangukusimusi selles saates pole. Stuudios on kaks võistlejat, kes hakkavad kusimustele otsima sobilikke vastuseid. Iga kusimusega kaasneb kumme vastusevarianti, millest seitse on õiged ja kolm valed. "Kahevõitlus" on ka taktikamang, sest vahel on kasulikum vastamiskord konkurendile loovutada. Iga saate võitja paaseb edasi jargmisesse saatesse ning iga saate auhinnalaual on kuni 1000€ vaartuses auhindu!

programme.title: Lastega kodus
programme.desc: D.J. pakub end Stephnie elutreeneriks. Kimmy pakub end Stevei ja CJ pulmakorraldajaks Jaapanis.

programme.title: Suur lotokolmapaev
programme.desc: Suur lotokolmapaev toob korraga tele-ekraanidele lõbusa peremangu "Rooside sõda" ja ka Eesti suurimad lotovõidud! Kristjan Jõekalda juhtimisel kingib saade igal nadalal juurde tuhandeid lotovõitjaid ja igal aastal jagatakse lotomangijate vahel laiali miljoneid eurosid! Naudi lõbusat meelelahutust ja loosiõnne igal lotokolmapaeval!

programme.title: Imikuga metsas
programme.desc: Tõnu, Sindia, Tarko Torm ja Terko Taur jõuavad laagrikohta, kust sai alguse Jurgensonide armastuslugu. Mets taitub kulalistega. Kogemusi ning oskusi lastega metsas hakkama saamiseks tulevad ammutama mitmed perekonnad, kus samuti kasvamas vaiksed lapsed. Tõnust ja Sindiast on saanud justkui lasteaiaõpetajad, Suua otsitakse puupaku vahelt. Metsas leitavast prugist tehakse, sooja andvaid kuunlaid. Ning noast meisterdakse oda, millega saab end kaitsta kasvõi karu vastu. Kuidas hoida sugisese jaheduse keskel telk soojas ning kuidas valgustada kaeparaste vahenditega pimedaid õhtuid? Tõnu nipinurk annab vastuseid.

programme.title: Naised saunas raakisid
programme.desc: Igal nadalalõpul tuleb Kaie uhkesse koju kulla tema sõbranna Elina koos tutre Simonaga. Kulaskaigu juurde kuulub kindlasti saun, kus nauditakse kuuma leili, head veini, kuid alati ka mõnda mahlakat suhtelugu, mis isearanis naistele suurt huvi pakub. Kaie, Elina ja Simona teavad Eesti elu selliseid saladusi, millega paljud on kokku puutunud, kuid, millest harva raakida julgetakse. Igas episoodis keskendutakse uhele loole ja tuuakse see juhtum lavastuslikult ka televaatajani. Olgu selleks siis naiteks vanglast vabanenud mehe armupuunis kergeusklikele naistele, parima sõbra pruudi uleloomine, mesikeelse valeliku mitmenaisepidaja paljastamine või koshmaarseks muutuv elu koos ammaga.

programme.title: Minu saladus
programme.desc: Eugenio testib Lucio lojaalsust. Mateo saab ahvatleva toopakkumise. Iker raagib Mateole oma tunnetest Valeria vastu. Fedra tahab Mariana testamenti havitada.

programme.title: Kes on boss?
programme.desc: Diclei ja Ceyda suhted muutuvad pingeliseks. Baris seisab Aydini tõttu silmitsi raske olukorraga. Nurteni lapselaps ajab Peride hulluks. Julide ja Arzu vajavad oma manedžeri Cinari tahelepanu ja hoolt.

programme.title: Kirgede torm
programme.desc: Ana korraldab VIP-kulalise pojale aardejahti. Vincent ja Natalia lahevad reisile. Gunther teeb Helenele erilise ulestunnistuse.

programme.title: Suletud uste taga
programme.sub-title: Elu koos endise ja uue mehega
programme.desc: Juba mõni aeg tagasi lõppenud kooselust hoolimata keeldub Kersti endine mees Sven lahkumast nii naise elust kui ka Kersti vanemate abil soetatud vanast majast.

programme.title: Kahevõitlus
programme.desc: Haarav ja humoorikas "Kahevõitlus" sobib igale hakkajale inimesele, sest raskeid malumangukusimusi selles saates pole. programme.title: TV3 uudised
programme.desc: "TV3 uudised" on nuud igal argiõhtul eetris tunnise saatena. Olulisemad paevasundmused toome vaatajateni koos taiendavate lisakommentaaride ja erinevaid vaatenurki avava analuusiga. Uudistesaate juhid on Liina Kanarbik, Marek Lindmaa, Sander Terras, Liisa Aadussoo.

programme.title: Üle ja umber
programme.desc: Onu Raiu ja sõbrad jõuavad Kesk-Ameerika seikluse kaigus Nicaraguas kõige idapoolsemasse asulasse, kus nad naudivad varskeid tortillasid otse pannilt. Parast hindade võrdlemist kohalikus toidupoes tutvuvad mehed siinsete eksootiliste loomadega ja võtavad suuna tagasi Costa Rica poole. Costa Ricasse jõudes tuleb kõigile meelde, miks see riik pole nendesugustele seiklejatele sobivaim. Siiski võlub kohalik võõrustaja reisiseltskonda oma aia rikkaliku taimestikuga.

programme.title: Kattemaksukontor
programme.desc: UUS HOOAEG! Freya on tagasi kodumaal, et uuendada dokumente ja tõmmata kokku lahtised otsad, et alustada elus uut peatukki. Teised naasevad reisilt ja saavad lahendamiseks esmapilgul kerge juhtumi. Freya aga kohtub ootamatu kulalisega minevikust, kes kratsib lahti vana haava. Algab kassi-hiire mang.

programme.title: Kerge elu
programme.desc: Toomas ja tema naine Stella elavad koos oma kahe teismelise lapsega pealtnaha unistuste elu. Keegi ei või arvatagi, et pereisal on minevikust kahe miljoni suurune kaendusvõlg ja et seda peret hoitakse uleval ainult kuritegevusega. Kui aga Toomasele tuleb pakkumine osaleda suures raharoovis, ei aima veel keegi, kui halvasti asjad minema hakkavad. Osades Margus Prangel, Helena Merzin, Mirjam Aimla ja Siim Sups. Režissoor Raoul Suvi, stsenarist Mikko Polla.

programme.title: Ära liialt kaua mõtle
programme.desc: Jack (Keegan-Michael Key) ja Samantha (Gillian Jacobs) on õnnelik paar, kes kuuluvad vaiksesse improvisatsioonikomoodia truppi nimega Commune. Ühe etenduse ajal avastavad nad jahmunult, et publiku hulgas on ulipopulaarse sketðikomoodia saate Weekend Live produtsendid. Kui Jack saatesse osalema kutsutakse, hakkab ta suhe Samanthaga koost lagunema. Teised trupi liikmed lunivad, et saaksid saatesse sketðe kirjutada või ka ise prooviesinemisele paaseda. Kahjuks taipavad nad peatselt, et kõigile pole maaratud edu peadpooritavatesse kõrgustesse tõusta.

programme.title: Lauluassad 3
programme.desc: USA 2017 komoodia Lavastaja:Trish Sie Osades:Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson, Brittany Snow Parast kolledži lõpetamist on Bellade teed lahku lainud ning kohale jõudnud karm reaalsus - iseseisev elu polegi nii roosiline, kui noored naised lootsid. Leevendamaks igatsust koos olemise ja laulmise vastu võtavad preilid ette turnee Hispaaniasse, et esineda sealviibivatele USA sõduritele. Kohapeal korraldatakse aga võistlus terve plejaadi artistide vahel ning auhinnaks on uhistuur koos kuulsa rappar-produtsendi DJ Khalediga. Bellad saavad demonstreerida oma imelisi haali, a capella laulmise võlusid ja pidada maha laululahinguid, kuid nende vastastel on lisaks lauluhaalele ka teine relv - muusikainstrumendid. Kumb jaab peale, kas haaled või pillid, selles on kusimus.

programme.title: Üle ja umber

programme.title: Aerutades Alaskale
programme.sub-title: Ellujaamisvõistluse lõpp, seiklused USA-s, eestlased Kanadas.
programme.desc: 1600 km pikkune teekond Yukoni jõel aerutades saab labi. Sini-must-valge on viidud esmakordselt aerutades Alaskale. Kurnatud seiklejad on kui tulnukad teiselt planeedilt, kes ei leia oma õiget kohta maakeral. Selgub, et osa meist on USA-s illegaalidena. Sekelduste taustal tutvume aga uute eestlastega, kelle jaoks kauge ja karm maa on koduks. Seikluse lõpp tahendab ka rikkuse jaotamist. Leitud kuld luuakse letti.

programme.title: Üle ja umber

programme.title: Minu saladus
programme.desc: Constanza proovib hoiatada teisi tudrukuid Eugenio eest. Elena teeb Hilariole ja Mateole ulestunnistuse. Fedra ahvardab Danielat.

programme.title: Kes on boss?
programme.desc: Diclei vallandamine šokeerib Ego tootajaid. Kirac teeb Cinari ja Peridega uue plaani, kuidas Ceydast vabaneda. Arzu saab teada midagi Cinari mineviku kohta. Baris on hadas mehega, kellele Aydin raha võlgneb.

programme.title: Kirgede torm
programme.desc: Gunther uritab Helene sudant võita. Natalia tabab Vincenti temast ja Anast fotot vaatamas ning kahtleb mehe tunnetes. Michael hoiatab Guntherit.

programme.title: Suletud uste taga
programme.desc: Ootamatult mehe kaotanud Mariliis puhendab oma elu teismelise poja tegemiste kontrollimisele ning igal sammul poja asjadesse sekkumisele.

programme.title: Kahevõitlus
programme.desc: Haarav ja humoorikas "Kahevõitlus" sobib igale hakkajale inimesele, sest raskeid malumangukusimusi selles saates pole. Stuudios on kaks võistlejat, kes hakkavad kusimustele otsima sobilikke vastuseid. Iga kusimusega kaasneb kumme vastusevarianti, millest seitse on õiged ja kolm valed. Iga saate võitja paaseb edasi jargmisesse saatesse ning iga saate auhinnalaual on kuni 1000€ vaartuses auhindu!

programme.title: TV3 uudised
programme.desc: "TV3 uudised" on nuud igal argiõhtul eetris tunnise saatena. Olulisemad paevasundmused toome vaatajateni koos taiendavate lisakommentaaride ja erinevaid vaatenurki avava analuusiga. Uudistesaate juhid on Liina Kanarbik, Marek Lindmaa, Sander Terras, Liisa Aadussoo.

programme.title: Jaam kahele
programme.desc: Taavi Libe uus vestlussaade. Vahelduseks istub karastunud reporter Taavi maha sooja stuudiosse ja vestleb Eesti tuntud ja armastatud inimestega, kelle elu ja tegemised on meid kõiki puudutanud. Jutt kaib pariselt olulistel teemadel ja ikka sudamest sudamesse.

programme.title: Kolmekas
programme.desc: "Kolmekas" on TV3 uus hoogne teleshow, kus labi huumori võetakse ette teemad, mis eestlastele just praegu korda lahevad. "Kolmeka" juhid on Star FM hommikuprogrammist tuttavad Grete Kuld, Andres Puusepp ja Jurgen Parnsalu, kes moodustavad heas mõttes ohjeldamatu trio. Nad ei karda esitada oma kulalistele ootamatuid kusimusi ega võtta vastu enneolematuid valjakutseid ja seejuures enda ule naerda. Saadet vurtsitavad elav muusika ning lõbusad sketšid ja mangud.

programme.title: Kohtumine aiaga
programme.desc: USA 2000 komoodia Lavastaja: Jay Roach Osades: Ben Stiller, Robert De Niro, Teri Polo, Blythe Danner, Owen Wilson Greg Focker (Ben Stiller) unistab paevast, mil ta koos oma valjavalitu Pamiga (Teri Polo) altari ette astub. Paraku peab mees aga enne ettepaneku tegemist kohtuma tudruku vanematega ning sellest tõotab tulla põrgulik nadalavahetus. Pami isa, Jack Byrnes (Robert De Niro), ei varja esimesest hetkest oma suhtumist veidra nimega vaimehekandidaati ning see suhtumine on kõike muud kui soosiv. Ent sealt edasi laheb asi ainult hullemaks. "Kohtumine aiaga" on vaimukas komoodia, mille põhiteemaks peaaegu igas mehes peituv hirm paeva ees, mil tuleb astuda oma tulevase amma ja aia ette.

programme.title: Lapsed
programme.desc: Paul ja Ally peavad tegelema oma vananevate kehadega, mis paneb nende tujud kõikuma.

programme.title: Vabad mehed
programme.desc: Telesarja "Vabad Mehed" teisest hooajast valjakasvanud film raagib kapten Kullist(Ain Maeots), kes saadetakse talle endale vastumeelselt Kaitsevae kordusõppustele. Seal saab ta endale ruhma, kellega puuab iga hinnaga saavutada võitu, mis tuleb sõna otseses mõttes labi vere ja pisarate. Tal on kaaslaseks veebel Sander Torm(Anti Reinthal), kellega on neil Afganistaani paevilt vanad kanad kitkuda. Sarjast tuttavad noored on sedapuhku jaatud kahe suure sõjavaelase egode vahele ja tanu sellele tuleb neil rinda pista reaalsete ohtudega, mis paadib pagulaste smuugeldajate tagaajamisega.

programme.title: Võimalik vaid TikTokis
programme.desc: Elades huvitaval ajastul, kus iga paev toob midagi uut ja põnevat. Suurimat avastamisrõõmu pakub pidev teadmine, et maailm on tais varvikaid inimesi, kes suudavad korda saata uskumatuid tegusid, mida tihtipeale niinimetatud kaine mõistus ei suuda alati seletada. Uue saatesarjaga "Võimalik Vaid TikTokis" võtab Erkki Sarapuu endale missiooniks tutvustada selliseid "talente" televaatajatele ja tuua publiku ette "tõelise elu" kogemused.

programme.title: Lactu news
programme.desc: Le journal de TVMONACO.

programme.title: Lamour (presque) parfait
programme.desc: Ava se bat pour retrouver sa place de mère dans le coeur de ses enfants. Elle se rend compte par la meme occasion que Pierre est un excellent père. Au rugby, les amis de Stephane sont ravis de lui montrer le calendrier qui sera mis en vente au profit de lassociation qui lutte contre lhomophobie dans le sport. Stephane y est particulièrement à son avantage...

programme.title: Lamour (presque) parfait
programme.desc: Stephane se sent enfin pret à avouer à Julie quil nest pas homosexuel et surtout quil est fou amoureux delle. Au meme moment, Max pardonne à Julie ses mensonges et la demande en mariage. Mais au final, rien ne va se passer comme prevu...

programme.title: le journal Afrique
programme.desc: Toute lactualite africaine proposee par la redaction de TV5MONDE. http://information.tv5monde.com

programme.title: Meteo
programme.desc: Le bulletin meteorologique international.

programme.title: Temps present
programme.desc: Ukraine, la forteresse artistique au coeur de la guerre LUkraine devra-t-elle accepter la paix à nimporte quel prix ? La question se pose avec larrivee au pouvoir du president americain Donald Trump. Une incertitude de plus pour la population ukrainienne qui vit depuis trois ans sous les bombardements russes. Mais dans lhorreur de la guerre, quelques lueurs despoir avec la musique comme echappatoire.

programme.title: Boutiques obscures
programme.desc: Ils sont bouquinistes, coiffeurs, chapelières, mercières... Et sont habites par lamour de leur metier. Patrice Leconte a sillonne la France à la rencontre de celles et ceux qui, contre vents et marees, font perdurer leurs petits commerces.

programme.title: 60 jours pour se marier
programme.desc: 3 semaines après son arrivee en Suisse, Tim et Pierre-Alain font un mariage express en petit comite mais le quotidien du couple est très complique… Après leur mariage, Alain et Reyce sont de retour à Estavayer-le-Gibloux. Reyce affronte le froid et se prepare à passer un premier Noël sans son fils et avec sa belle famille. Valerie et Saman retournent au Nepal pour leurs vacances. Jessica et Leo senvolent pour le Mexique. Lartiste de cirque Jurassienne va decouvrir le pays et les traditions de son fiance.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: Presentee par Viviane Blassel, Tendance XXI est une emission consacree à la creation française et à la mode. Elle dresse le portrait de createurs passionnes et analyse des tendances actuelles ou qui ont profondement marquees lhistoire de la mode. Un magazine eclectique qui touche à tout.

programme.title: Ici cBabi
programme.desc: Sexe et pouvoir En quelques jours seulement, Agnès arrive à faire un grand nettoyage dans les ministères. Kader et Solou narrivent pas à depenser largent qui a coûte une jambe à Yaya. Fousseni demande à Maimouna de lui rendre ses economies afin quil achète son mini-car. Genre : comedie dramatique Palmarès : Mention speciale du jury (Fespaco 2023) ; Laurier francophone du Sud (Lauriers de laudiovisuel 2024)

programme.title: No Blabla - Version Derivee
programme.desc: Declinaison en courtes sequences de la serie " No Blabla " autour des rencontres et aventures extravagantes dun migrant africain, Blabla, dans une Afrique du XXIe siècle fantasmee. Traque par lA-Armee, le heros degaine ses armes : optimisme, romantisme et roublardise. Auteur : François Bergeron

programme.title: Merci Professeur
programme.desc: Avec Bernard Cerquiglini, decortiquez les curiosites de la langue française et devenez incollable sur les règles de français, les règles daccords, les tournures de phrases et le lexique de notre langue si riche et parfois si curieuse. Verbes pronominaux, adjectifs de couleurs, formules de politesse, mots qui changent de genre au pluriel, etymologies surprenantes : le français et ses specificites nauront plus aucun secret pour vous.

programme.title: C dans lair
programme.desc: Le prix du gaz senvole : + 4,8 % en janvier après plusieurs hausses, dejà, en octobre et juillet dernier... Avec le froid, les Français se chauffent davantage et les stocks ont diminue. Lautre explication reside dans la decision de lUkraine de mettre fin au transit du gaz russe à travers son territoire, marquant une rupture energetique decisive avec Moscou. Consequence directe : les Europeens - dont le tiers du gaz achete à la Russie passe par cette voie - ont perdu près de 15 milliards de mètres de cube de gaz, soit près de 5% de la consommation de lUnion europeenne. De quoi inquieter jusquau PDG de Total energies, Patrick Pouyanne, qui a demande jeudi à Davos au president americain Donald Trump des garanties sur la securite des approvisionnements de lEurope en gaz naturel liquefie americain... dont TotalEnergies est le principal exportateur.

programme.title: Suisse en scène
programme.desc: Nee dans une famille de musiciens classiques, formee à la flûte traversière, Marina Viotti commence par chanter du heavy metal avant dentreprendre des etudes de chant lyrique à plus de 25 ans. Courtisee par toutes les scènes doperas du monde, elle est recompensee dune Victoire de la musique en 2023. Parcours atypique pour un talent incontournable.

programme.title: Le 6h00 info
programme.desc: , première matinale dactualite de France, reste fidèle à son ambition dinformation, tout en etant resolument connectee à la vie et aux preoccupations des Français. Lemission, portee par une equipe de journalistes et de chroniqueurs, traitera quotidiennement une variete de thematiques, abordant lactualite avec serieux mais sans dramatisation.

programme.sub-title: Rocky and Lily : Cest dans la boîte !

programme.title: Les souvenirs de Mamette
programme.desc: Louis et sa bande ont vole la cabane de Marinette, Jacques et Jeannot, qui sont bien decides à la recuperer. Mais face à la tenacite de Louis et sa bande, bien vite le ton monte entre les trois copains et Marinette se retrouve exclue de la bataille sous pretexte quune fille ça ne sait pas commander

programme.title: Kenda
programme.desc: Les enfants decouvrent en jouant aux journalistes dans le jardin quil y a une femme dans le quartier qui ne respecte pas lenvironnement et jette ses ordures dans le caniveau du quartier. Ils decident den faire un reportage pour denoncer cet acte meprisable.

programme.title: Alix et les Merveilleux
programme.desc: Sous son escalier, Alix decouvre un passage menant à un monde fantaisiste dans lequel vivent detonnants personnages. Dans cet univers, la jeune fille debordante dimagination sevade pour vivre des aventures rocambolesques en compagnie de Chapelier et de ses amis, les Merveilleux.

programme.title: Habitants du nord
programme.desc: Après trois jours à Tuktoyaktuk, Vincent et Nadia sappretent à repartir. Mais avant, ils soffrent leurs dernières aventures. Cest aussi le temps des bilans : les explorateurs reviennent sur leurs moments preferes du voyage.

programme.desc: Chroniques den Haut nous emmène dans le Beaufortain, le pays du Beaufort, en Savoie. Laurent Guillaume nous fait decouvrir ses paysages montagneux spectaculaires et ses alpages verdoyants, accompagne par la championne de ski handisport, Marie Brochet.>> La page de Chroniques den Haut : https://france3-regions.francetvinfo.fr/auvergne-rhone-alpes/programmes/france-3_auvergne-rhone-alpes_chroniques-d-en-haut

programme.title: Un si grand soleil
programme.desc: Marc se retrouve accule et doit enfin sexpliquer sur ses mensonges qui ont bouleverse sa famille. Pendant ce temps, Maeva attend avec anxiete larrivee de Tom pour un moment decisif de sa vie. Dans une course contre la montre, Tom traverse la ville, esperant ne pas manquer ce rendez-vous important...

programme.title: Tout le monde veut prendre sa place
programme.desc: Retrouvez le replay de votre emission quotidienne "Tout le monde veut prendre sa place", chaque jour sur la plateforme France TV. Six candidats affrontent un "champion" autour dune serie de jeux. Celui ou celle qui parviendra à le deloger deviendra le nouveau champion. La manche 1 senrichit dune nouveaute majeure : les QPT ! Ces "Questions Pour Tous" posees simultanement aux 6 candidats donnent un nouveau rythme, creent des surprises, renversent les scores en sajoutant aux 2 questions de chacun. Chaque candidats a desormais 4 chances de passer en deuxième manche et davancer vers le fauteuil. Une selection plus juste, avec davantage de suspense.

programme.title: Dans un cinema près de chez vous
programme.desc: Plongee dans les coulisses de lindustrie cinematographique quebecoise en compagnie de Karine Vanasse. Du plateau à la salle de montage, du scenario à la post-production ou à la projection publique, elle va à la rencontre de celles et de ceux qui creent les fictions, documentaires, films danimation...

programme.title: Loeil du cyclone
programme.desc: La fete des jumeaux arrive à grands pas et Isabelle anticipe avoir à tout gerer une fois de plus ou pire… de navoir aucun contrôle. Jade tombe sur le journal intime de sa mère qui prouve quavec le temps les reves changent, mais certains fantasmes demeurent.

programme.title: Tenir salon

programme.title: Tenir salon
programme.desc: Cap chez Barberito, coiffeur dominicain, installe dans le quartier latino de Montreal. Au salon, lambiance est caliente ! Entre une pupusa et une epilation des sourcils à la lame, Sophie discute avec ces hommes du sens de lamitie et de masculinite.

programme.title: Lecologie en action
programme.desc: Sancerrois, Sologne, pays de Redon, Beauce... À la decouverte de sites ecologiques riches en biodiversite.

programme.title: Un si grand soleil
programme.desc: Après avoir echappe à un grave danger, Maeva et Tom decouvrent quils etaient la cible dun complot orchestre contre eux. Refusant de rester passifs, ils decident de contre-attaquer. De son côte, Leonor affronte une situation personnelle qui la contraint à une decision aux consequences irreversibles...

programme.title: Hep taxi ! Express
programme.desc: Jerôme Colin, animateur-taximan, embarque une personnalite lors dune course express et decalee, souvent propice aux confidences.

programme.title: Questions pour un champion
programme.desc: Un jeu realise par Olivier Baudoin et Karl Grosse Produit par Fremantle, avec la participation de France 3 Anime par Samuel Etienne Jeu emblematique construit autour de la culture generale, lemission culte "Questions pour un champion" se deroule en trois manches : - Le "9 points gagnants" lors de laquelle la rapidite est de mise. - Le "4 à la suite" où dans un temps de 40 secondes maximum, le but est de donner 4 bonnes reponses à la suite sur un thème choisi. - Et le "Face-à-face", manche lors de laquelle plus vous repondez rapidement, plus vous marquez de points. Le premier candidat qui atteint 12 points remporte le match. Le champion pourra repartir avec ses gains (fonction de son nombre de victoires successives) ou revenir le lendemain affronter 3 nouveaux candidats et tenter de remporter la cagnotte au bout de 5 victoires successives et continuer ensuite indefiniment (remportant 500€ à chaque victoire supplementaire). A loccasion de la reouverture tant attendue de Notre-Dame de Paris, Samuel Etienne et toute lequipe du jeu vous proposent quatre emissions Speciales Patrimoine les 7, 8, 9 et 10 decembre où le patrimoine français sera celebre grâce à de nombreuses questions, un hommage à lhistoire et à la culture française, à ne pas manquer sur France Televisions ! Les candidats et candidates, ainsi que les telespectateurs et telespectatrices, retrouveront aussi les questions habituelles du jeu dans tous les domaines de la culture generale.

programme.title: Face aux territoires

programme.sub-title: 64 minutes, le monde en français, 1re partie
programme.desc: Rendez-vous de linformation et de la culture francophone propose par la redaction de TV5MONDE, presente par Mohamed Kaci (du lundi au jeudi) et Xavier Lambrechts (du vendredi au dimanche). Grande edition internationale en langue française, 64 Le Monde en Français met laccent sur lactualite mondiale, lactualite francophone, culturelle, politique, economique, sociale, et societale ainsi que sur linformation developpee par les partenaires historiques de TV5 Monde : la RTBF, la RTS, Radio Canada, Tele-Quebec, France 2, France 3.

programme.title: Linvite
programme.desc: Animee par Patrick Simonin, lemission Linvite est votre rendez-vous quotidien dinformation francophone. Chaque jour, un acteur de lactualite politique, sociale, culturelle ou economique se livre à une interview de 8 minutes pour donner aux spectateurs les cles de lactualite.

programme.title: Le code
programme.desc: Idriss Toma, 46 ans, lavocat parisien des riches et des puissants, voit sa vie basculer lorsquil est victime dune tentative de meurtre. Il en rechappe miraculeusement, mais un eclat de balle inoperable peut desormais lui etre fatal à tout moment. Decide à corriger ses erreurs personnelles et professionnelles, il revient à Lille, sa ville natale, et sassocie avec Nadia Ayad, une avocate engagee, et Jeanne Vanhoven, une ex-gloire du barreau. Ensemble, ils mettent leur audace et leur talent au service de ceux que la machine judiciaire menace decraser. Idriss et Claire representent Estelle Lantez, accusee du meurtre de son compagnon violent. La cliente assure avoir agi en etat de legitime defense mais très vite, les avocats comprennent que la realite est tout autre...

programme.title: Le code
programme.desc: Après une tentative de meurtre dont il rechappe de justesse, Idriss Toma, avocat parisien habitue à une clientèle fortunee, decide de changer sa pratique professionnelle. Installe à Lille et associe à deux femmes de temperament, il veut desormais mettre son talent au service des plus modestes, dont lappareil judiciaire ne fait que peu de cas. Cest lequipe qui a realise la serie Cherif qui sempare aujourdhui dun sujet epineux. Chaque episode aborde un cas judiciaire different, defendu par une actrice ou un acteur vu dans les fictions de France TV.

programme.title: Journal France 2
programme.desc: Le journal televise propose par la redaction de France 2 (edition de 20h, heure de Paris).

programme.title: Meteo
programme.desc: Le bulletin meteorologique international.

programme.title: Un fils
programme.desc: A lete 2011, Fares et Meriem partent avec leur fils Aziz, âge dune dizaine dannees, pour un week-end à Tataouine, dans le sud de la Tunisie. Sur le chemin du retour, ils se retrouvent pris dans une embuscade terroriste, et une balle perdue blesse grièvement le garçon. Touche à labdomen, Aziz arrive à lhôpital dans un etat critique, et seule une greffe de foie pourrait le sauver. Fares et Meriem se retrouvent embarques dans une veritable course contre la montre pour preserver la vie de leur enfant. Pour son premier film, Mehdi Barsaoui signe un drame à la fois sobre et intense plebiscite par la critique et notamment recompense à la Mostra de Venise (prix Interfilm et meilleure interpretation masculine pour Sami Bouajila).

programme.title: Lactu news
programme.desc: Le journal de TVMONACO.

programme.title: Le grand dossier - Le debat
programme.sub-title: Elon Musk, le nouveau maître du monde
programme.desc: Cest lhomme le plus riche du monde et peut-etre le plus puissant desormais. Elon Musk, " colocataire " de Donald Trump à la Maison Blanche, poursuit sa conquete. Produire des millions de voitures electriques, lancer des fusees et placer des satellites en orbite ne lui suffit plus. Aujourdhui, il est determine à imposer sa vision du monde, et à lutter contre toute forme de regulation, grâce à ses leviers politiques et technologiques. Et en premier lieu grâce à son reseau social X qui, plus que jamais, est devenu une caisse de resonnance à ses idees reactionnaires et libertariennes. La democratie est-elle entree dans une nouvelle ère, dominee par les seigneurs de la tech ? Comment eviter, en Europe, de nous faire devorer ? Elon Musk est-il le nouveau maître du monde ? Voilà les questions au cœur du debat que Julie Morelle animera avec, comme invites, leconomiste Bruno Colmant, le philosophe Pascal Chabot, lavocate Typhanie Afschrift et le philosophe specialiste US Benoît Frydman.

programme.title: le journal Afrique
programme.desc: Toute lactualite africaine proposee par la redaction de TV5MONDE. http://information.tv5monde.com

programme.title: Des racines and des ailes
programme.desc: Le Tro Breizh, un chemin sacre de 1 500 km, traverse des forets legendaires, comme la mythique foret de Broceliande, sillonne des rivages paradisiaques, comme la baie de Morlaix et gravit les collines sacrees des monts dArree. Ce pèlerinage, ne au Moyen Âge, invitait les fidèles à prier les 7 saints fondateurs de la Bretagne. Au fil des siècles, son trace historique a disparu. Mais, aujourdhui, Arnaud et Laurine, des passionnes dhistoire et de patrimoine, creent un guide sur le Tro Breizh, en repertoriant le patrimoine religieux et naturel de ce Compostelle breton…. Claire Babet, maître verrier, va pendant plusieurs mois restaurer les plus anciens vitraux de la cathedrale de Dol de Bretagne. Cet artisan dart va se battre pour redonner de la lumière à ce chef-dœuvre. Ronan Bourroulec, un designer breton connu dans le monde entier, sest lance un defi : redonner une âme à la chapelle Saint-Michel de Brasparts. Pendant six mois, nous avons suivi la creation du nouveau mobilier et la restauration de ce lieu symbolique, perche au sommet dune colline des monts dArree. À Quimper, Soizic Le Goff, architecte des bâtiments de France, pilote un chantier exceptionnel : la creation dune nouvelle cloche pour le campanile de la cathedrale Saint-Corentin. Elle supervise la naissance de cet instrument sacre, fabrique dans une fonderie qui perpetue son savoir-faire depuis plus de trois siècles.

programme.title: Au pays du bonheur
programme.desc: Marc-Andre part à la decouverte dAmsterdam. Ici, on prend soin des aines et on developpe lautonomie des adolescents, qui seraient les plus heureux du monde. Le velo nest pas seulement un moyen de transport, cest un mode de vie ancre dans le quotidien des Neerlandais. Avec Marc-Andre Carignan.
